  23. Standard Terms and Conditions of "Invite Friends" program.

    The Dream11 Invite Friends Program lets you invite friends to join Dream11 ("Program"). In the event that you and your referred friend meet the criteria and complete all the steps specified in these terms, you can earn a Cash Bonus from Dream11 of upto Rs. 200 ("Bonus Amount"), which Bonus Amount will be redeemable to join cash contests and contests through the Dream11’s mobile application for the iOS and/or Android mobile devices ("Dream11 Application") and your friend will receive discount coupons worth Rs. 200 ( “Invitee Discount”). To participate in the Program, please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Program:

    • Eligibility – All users who: (i) have an account registered with Dream11's fantasy gaming platform ("Platform"); and (ii) are eligible to participate in the pay-to play game (as per the Dream11's terms and conditions, accessible at https://fantasycricket.dream11.com/in/termsandconditions); and (iii) have downloaded and installed the Dream11 Application on their respective mobile devices, will be eligible to participate in the Program. Participation in the Program by proxy is not permitted.
    • Participation in the Program is voluntary. A user shall not register or operate more than one user account with Dream11 and shall not participate in the Program with more than one user account with Dream11.
    • The Program will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time 03:00:00 hours on 25th March, 2021 till IST 23:59:59 hours on 28th February, 2023.
    • By participating in the Program, you agree to and accept these Terms.
    • For the purpose of participation in the Program, you are required to have the Dream11 Application downloaded and installed on your mobile device. Through the Dream11 Application, you will be provided with a unique link or code, which can be shared by you ("Inviter") with friends (each an "Invitee") for the purpose of inviting such friends to create and register an account with Dream11 and download the Dream11 Application. On receiving the link or code from the Inviter, the Invitee may either: (i) Click on the link, consequent to which such Invitee will be directed to a registration page and will be provided the option to register an account with Dream11 and download and install the Dream11 Application on his/her device; or (ii) download and install the Dream11 Application on his/her device independently, register for a Dream11 account through the Dream11 Application and enter the unique code shared by the Inviter where prompted in the Dream11 Application.
    • The Inviter and the Invitee will be eligible to earn the Bonus Amount subject to (amongst other terms specified in these Terms): (i) the Invitee not being an existing user of Dream11; and (ii) the Inviter and Invitee being eligible to participate in the pay-to play Dream11 fantasy cricket, fantasy basketball, fantasy hockey, fantasy volleyball, fantasy kabaddi, fantasy baseball, fantasy handball, fantasy American football or fantasy football game; and (iii) the Invitee successfully registering for an account with Dream11 through the unique link or by using the unique code shared by the Inviter; and (iv) the Inviter and Invitee agreeing to the license agreement for the Dream11 Application and downloading and installing the Dream11 Application as available for the Inviter’s and Invitee’s respective mobile devices. For the purposes of these Terms, an 'existing user of Dream11' shall mean a user who presently operates an account with the Platform or operated an account with the Platform at any point of time.
    • An Invitee who is an existing user of Dream11 is not permitted to register a new account with the Platform for the purpose of availing of the Bonus Amount. Dream11 will determine in its sole discretion whether an Invitee is an existing user of Dream11 or not and take appropriate action.
    • In the event that the Invitee opts to register for a Dream11 account through the Dream11 Application, the Invitee can verify his/her contact information at the time of registration.
    • The verification process may require an Inviter/Invitee to submit personal information about the user (Inviter/Invitee) and documents identifying the Inviter/Invitee. The Inviter agrees to receive communication from Dream11 and to allow Dream11 to communicate with Invitees referred by you about the Inviter's participation in the Program. Any information collected in respect of the Inviter/Invitee as part of the Program or otherwise in the course of such person's use of the Website shall be subject to Dream11's Privacy Policy (available here: https://fantasycricket.dream11.com/in/privacypolicy for Indian users)
    • The verification of an Inviter/Invitee shall be completed at the time of first withdrawal by the Inviter/Invitee from the Inviter’s/Invitee's 'Winnings' Account with the Platform. An Inviter/Invitee may voluntarily seek verification of the Inviter/Invitee by clicking on the 'Verify Now' tab on the Winnings tab on the My Balance Page of the Inviter/Invitee's account with the Platform.
    • The Invitee will be eligible to receive a maximum discount of Rs.200 (“Invitee Discount”).This Invitee Discount shall be available for utilisation as per the table below . Please note the promotions mentioned below are non-shareable and can be used only the user who receive the specific communication from the Platform. The Promotions are available to use within seven (7) days of registration on the platform.
      Promotion When What Amount Validity
      Promotion No.1 Right after registration 75% off on contests above 1000 member Rs.33 Single Use 7 days from the date of registration
      Promotion No.2 Upon successful utilisation of Promotion No.1 50% off on contests above 1000 member Rs.33 Single Use 7 days from the date of utilisation of first offer
      Promotion No.3 Upon successful utilisation of Promotion No.2 25% off on contests above 1000 member Rs.33 Single Use 7 days from the date of utilisation of second offer
      Promotion No.4 Upon successful utilisation of Promotion No.3 10% off on all contests Rs.101 Multiple Use 14 days from the date of utilisation of third offer
    • Inviter Bonus a) In order for an Inviter to be eligible to earn the Bonus Amount due to him/her ("Inviter Bonus"), the Inviter must also download and install the Dream11 Application on his/her mobile device. b) The credit of the Inviter Bonus is contingent on the Invitee's deposit of any Amount in its Unutilised Account and using such amounts to participate in cash contests on the Platform. The Inviter shall be eligible to receive 10% of deposit amount used by the Invitee to join any cash contests on the Platform. subject to a maximum of Rs. 200. As an example, in the event that the invitee uses Rs. 100 from his Unutilized Account to join a cash contest on the Platform, the Inviter shall be eligible to receive Rs. 10 as Inviter Bonus upon the successful completion of such contest. c) Subject to the provisions of a) and b) above, the applicable Inviter Bonus earned by the Inviter shall be credited to the Inviter's Cash Bonus Account within fifteen (15) days of the completion of the cash contest . d) It is clarified that the Inviter will be eligible to receive the Inviter Bonus with respect to any contests only in the event the winners are declared for such contests. In the event that the contest entry amount paid by the Invitee is refunded to the Invitee with respect to any cash contest, for any reason, the Inviter shall not be eligible to receive any Inviter Bonus for such contest or contest.
    • The Bonus Amounts credited to the Inviter can be used by the Inviter/ to join cash contests and contests offered by Dream11 through the Platform. No part of the Bonus Amount may be used to join private contests or be withdrawn or transferred to any other cash balance account held by the Inviter/Invitee with Dream11 or to any third party account or to any bank/payment instrument account. THE BONUS AMOUNT SHALL EXPIRE AND BE WITHOUT EFFECT AT THE END OF FOURTEEN DAYS FROM THE DATE OF CREDIT OF THE BONUS AMOUNT.
    • The deposit of the Bonus Amount shall be at the sole discretion of Dream11 and shall be subject to the Inviter’s/Invitee’s compliance with these Terms. Dream11 may substitute or change the Bonus Amount offered under the Program at any time without notice. An Inviter may not substitute the amount of Bonus Amount or substitute offering for other items or exchange for cash.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to:
      • withhold the deposit of the Bonus Amount; and/or
      • forfeit any deposited Bonus Amount to an Inviter/Invitee or any prizes/winnings earned by the participant by using such Bonus Amount; and/or
      • deactivate the accounts of the Inviter/Invitee, in the event that it determines or reasonably believes that such Inviter/Invitee has violated these Terms or the terms and conditions of the Dream11 fantasy games.
    • Mere participation in the Program does not entitle the Inviter to receive any Bonus Amount.
    • Dream11 may, at its sole and absolute discretion, disqualify any Inviter/Invitee if such Inviter/Invitee engages in or it is found that such Inviter/Invitee has engaged in any illegal, unlawful or improper conduct (with regard to the Program or otherwise).
    • The decision of Dream11 will be final and binding with regard to the Program, and the deposit of the Bonus Amount and the Invitee Discount and no correspondence, objection, complaints, etc. will be entertained in this regard.
    • This Program cannot be clubbed with any other contests/promotions/programs that are running simultaneously and organised or conducted by Dream11.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to change/modify/or withdraw the Program and/or change these terms and conditions without any prior notice of the same at its sole discretion.
    • The Terms and Conditions, as applicable to the Dream11's fantasy games and services, will apply to and govern the Program.
    • Dream11 does not make any commitment, express or implied, to respond to any feedback, suggestion and, or, queries of the participants (Inviter/Invitee) of the Program.
    • Notwithstanding anything contained herein, the aggregate liability of Dream11 to a participating Inviter/Invitee in relation to the Program for any reason whatsoever shall not exceed Rs.200.

  1. Standard Terms and Conditions of Promotions

    These standard terms and conditions of promotions (“Standard Terms”) supplement the terms of promotions undertaken on the Dream11 website and which reference these Standard Terms (each a “Promotion”):

    • Participation in any Promotion will be subject to a user complying with the Promotion Terms implemented by Dream11 in respect of such Promotion (“Promotion Terms”) and these Standard Terms. By participating in any Promotion, the participant further consents to and agrees to adhere with the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game and Dream11’s privacy policy.
    • The Promotions are only open to users in India. Participation in the Promotions by proxy is not permitted.
    • Participation in the Promotions is voluntary.
    • Participation in one Promotion does not guarantee that such user will be eligible to participate in another Promotion.
    • A user may participate in a Promotion and avail of each Promotion only through one account. An existing user of Dream11 shall not register a new account or operate more than one user account with Dream11 or participate in a Promotion by registering a new account.
    • Users intending to participate in a Promotion may be required to verify their mobile number and other account details in accordance with the Promotion Terms for such Promotion.
    • Persons intending to participate in a Promotion, who have listed their phone numbers on the National Do Not Call Registry (“NDNC Registry”), shall de-register themselves from the NDNC Registry till the completion of such Promotion (including the delivery of Bonus Amount (if any) or the free-entry (if any) under such Promotion). Such persons agree not to make any claim or raise any complaint whatsoever against Dream11 in this respect. Please note that persons intending to participate in a Promotion who have not de-registered themselves from the NDNC Registry shall also have no right to make any claim or raise any complaints against Dream11 if they do or do not receive any call or SMS with respect to their participation and all other matters pertaining to a Promotion.
    • The verification process may require you to submit personal information about yourself. You agree to receive communication from Dream11. Any information collected in respect of your identity and contact details as part of a Promotion or otherwise in the course of your use of the Dream11 Website shall be subject to Dream11’s Privacy Policy
    • Dream11 may, at its sole and absolute discretion, disqualify any user from a Promotion if such user engages in or it is found that such user has engaged in any illegal, unlawful or improper conduct (with regard to any of the Promotions or otherwise).
    • The Bonus Amount (if any) deposited into the user’s account can be used to join cash contests and contests on Dream11. However, the Bonus Amount (if any) cannot be: (i) used to join 2-member contests; or (ii) withdrawn or transferred to any other cash balance account held by you with Dream11 or to any third party account or to any bank/payment instrument account. THE BONUS AMOUNT (IF ANY) SHALL EXPIRE AND BE WITHOUT EFFECT AT THE END OF FOURTEEN DAYS FROM THE DATE OF CREDIT OF THE BONUS AMOUNT (IF ANY).
    • The deposit of the Bonus Amount (if applicable) or the grant of the free-entry (if any) shall be at the sole discretion of Dream11 and shall be subject to the user’s compliance with these Standard Terms and the applicable Promotion Terms. Dream11 may substitute or change the Bonus Amount(if any) or free-entry (if any) offered under a Promotion at any time without notice. Users may not substitute Bonus Amount (if any) or free-entry (if any) for other items or exchange for cash.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to withhold or forfeit the benefits of a Promotion (including a free-entry or Bonus Amount due to a participant or any prizes/winnings earned by the participant by using such benefits) in the event that it determines or reasonably believes that the participating user has violated these Standard Terms, the applicable Promotion Terms or the terms and conditions of the Dream11 fantasy game(s).
    • Mere participation in a Promotion does not entitle the participant to receive any free-entry or Bonus Amount(s) indicated as a prize under such Promotion
    • The decision of Dream11 will be final and binding with respect to the Promotions, and the prizes therein and no correspondence, objection, complaints, etc. will be entertained in this regard.
    • Each Promotion cannot be clubbed with any of other contest/offer/promotion that are running simultaneously and organised or conducted by Dream11.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to change/modify/or withdraw any of the Promotions and/or change these Standard Terms and/or the Promotion Terms without any prior notice of the same at its sole discretion.
    • Dream11 does not make any commitment, express or implied, to respond to any feedback, suggestion and, or, queries of the participants of the Promotions.
    • Notwithstanding anything contained herein, the aggregate liability of Dream11 to a participating user in relation to any Promotion for any reason whatsoever shall not exceed Rs. 50.
    • The Promotions shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of India, and any disputes or disagreements in respect of this Promotion shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Mumbai.

  2. Refer a Friend Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This refer a Friend offer is open to all existing users of Dream11. Under this Promotion, users who invite (“Inviter”) their friends (“Invitee”) to join the Dream11 platform and makes their first deposit of minimum Rs. 100 (“Qualifying Deposit”). The invitee shall be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus amount of Rs.100 ("Bonus Amount") and the Inviter shall receive a 50% Discount Coupon of Rs.100 (“Inviter Discount Coupon”). The Bonus Amount will be credited into the Invitee’s Dream11 Cash Bonus account, in accordance with and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who invite their friends to join Dream11 and make their First Qualifying Deposit.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here).
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 21:00:00 hours on February 10th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on March 10th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • The Inviter shall be eligible to receive the Discount Coupons for the first five (5) invitees who make the Qualifying Deposit during the promotion period.
    • The Invitee shall receive the Cash Bonus instantly on depositing money into the Deposit Account. There is no maximum limit on the number of Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only for First Qualifying Deposit.
    • The Inviter shall receive their Inviter Discount Coupon within 24 hours from the time of First Qualifying Deposit made by their Invitee. The 50% discount can be applied on any contests having entry amount greater than Rs.100. The maximum discount value is Rs.100.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • Discount Coupon expires within 7 days of credit.

  3. Dream11 February Flash Deposit Bonus Offer Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This "Dream11 February Flash Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to select users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 18:00:00 hours on Feb 12th, 2020 till IST 21:30:00 hours on Feb 12th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR) Max Redeemable Amount
      277 100 1,000
      177 50 500
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • The maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be 10. The Bonus Amount shall be credited for each of your Qualifying Deposits upto a maximum of 10 Qualifying Deposits of each Qualifying Deposit Amount. To clarify, a user can make a maximum of 10 deposits of Rs. 277 and a maximum of 10 deposits of Rs 177.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on Feb 13th,2020.
    • The maximum Redeemable Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 1,500. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to make 10 qualifying deposits of each unique Qualifying Deposit amount.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  6. Women’s T20 World Cup Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 1 (21st February – 23rd February) – 50% Discount Pass

    • This Women’s T20 World Cup Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Women’s T20 World Cup Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Women’s T20 World Cup Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 12 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 23rd February, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on 24th February, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on 24th February, 2020.
    • The Discount Pass will allow the user to avail a 50% discount in any of the remaining matches of the Women’s T20 World Cup, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-3 7,500
      4-10 1,000
      11-100 500
      101-5,000 150
      5,001-15,000 75
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on 24th February, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount coupon expires on 8th March, 2020.
    • Discount coupons cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, discount coupons cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available with any user.

  7. Women’s T20 World Cup Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 2 (24th February – 1st March) – 50% Discount Pass

    • This Women’s T20 World Cup Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Women’s T20 World Cup Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Women’s T20 World Cup Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 12 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 1st March, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on 2nd March, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on 2nd March, 2020.
    • The Discount Pass will allow the user to avail a 50% discount in any of the remaining matches of the Women’s T20 World Cup, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-3 10,000
      4-10 5,000
      11-100 1,000
      101-10,000 150
      10,001-20,000 50
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on 2nd March, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount coupon expires on 8th March, 2020.
    • Discount coupons cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, discount coupons cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available with any user.

  8. NZ vs IND Series: Social Promotion

    This "NZ vs IND Series: Social Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who receive the in-app communication while clicking on the Feed tab on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, the 10 unique users who make at least one post of their favourite moment from the New Zealand- India series, which includes the New Zealand-India T20 series held from January 24th 2020 to February 2nd 2020, the New Zealand-India ODI series held from February 5th 2020 to February 11th 2020 and the New Zealand-India Test Match series held from February 21st 2020 to February 25th 2020, and receive the highest number of reactions on this post during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), of INR 1000.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through an in-app communication by clicking on the Feed tab on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 00:00:00 hours on February 21st, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on February 25th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that only the posts made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any posts that are made by the user before or after the Promotion Period.
    • If a user has posted multiple images with the promotion hashtag during the Promotion period, only one image - the image with the highest number of reactions -will be taken into consideration. The same user who has posted multiple images cannot receive the Cash Bonus amount more than once.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on February 27th,2020.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 1000.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  9. Women’s T20 World Cup Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 3 (2nd March – 8th March) – 50% Ind vs SA ODI Series Discount Pass

    • This Women’s T20 World Cup Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Women’s T20 World Cup Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Women’s T20 World Cup Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 12 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 8th March, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on 9th March, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on 9th March, 2020.
    • The Discount Pass will allow the user to avail a 50% discount in any India vs South Africa ODI match between 12th March, 2020 and 18th March, 2020, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-3 15,000
      4-50 4,000
      51-1000 400
      1,001-12,000 100
      12,001-25,000 65
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on 9th March, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount coupon expires on 18th March, 2020.
    • Discount coupons cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, discount coupons cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available with any user.

  10. Sign-up Deposit Bonus Offer

    This "Sign-up Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all new users of Dream11 who register between March 2nd, 2020, 12:00:00 PM to June 1st 2020, 23:59:59 PM (“Qualifying Users”). Under this Promotion, Qualifying Users who make their ‘first’ deposit as a Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to newly registered users of Dream11 who have never deposited money and who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on March 2nd, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on June 1st 2020 ("Promotion Period")
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make your first deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by a user, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      33 25
      77 50
      99 150
      199 200
      399 500
      999 1500
    • Please note that only the first Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount.
    • Subject to users' compliance with these Terms, the Cash Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account within 24 hours of your qualifying deposit
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to users' Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 1500.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  11. PSL Championship: Week (9th March – 15th March) – 50% IPL Discount Pass

    • This PSL Championship ("Championship"), is open to all users of Dream11 who receive the mail communication inviting them for the Championship.
    • In this Championship, the first 1,999 users who join the “PSL Championship” Group on the Dream11 platform before IST 11:59:59 hours on 9th March, 2020, shall be considered as a participant for this Championship.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Championship, users will be requested to join a specified free contest with 1 team for every PSL match in the Championship’s schedule and only the points scored by that team shall be considered. Failure to join this specified contest will result in 0 points for that round.
    • The Leaderboard shall be updated 12 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with highest total score across all rounds in the Championship shall be declared the Winner.
    • The Winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on 16th March, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on 16th March, 2020.
    • The Discount Pass will allow the user to avail a 50% discount in any IPL 2020 match, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1 25,000
      2 10,000
      3 5,000
      4-10 2,500
      11-30 1,000
      31-100 500
      101-250 200
      251-500 100
      501-1600 60
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at end of the Championship shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Championship.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Championship, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount coupon expires after the last round of IPL 2020.
    • Discount coupons cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, discount coupons cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available with any user.

  12. PLAY MORE GAIN MORE (Discount Offer)

    This Discount Offer is open to select users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, users who enter 6 paid contests on each day of the promotion period having entry fee above Rs. 50 shall be eligible to receive a Discount Coupon, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 20:00:00 hours on March 11th, 2020 till IST 21:30:00 hours on March 17th 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, users must participate in 6 paid contest on each day of the promotion period to be eligible to receive the Discount Coupon.
    • The Discount Coupon will be sent to the qualifying users within 24 hours.
    • The user can avail the offer only once per day.
    • The Discount Coupon will give the users a 60% discount worth Rs. 600 on contests having entry fee below Rs. 50. A user can use a maximum discount of Rs.100 discount per match.
    • The maximum Discount Amount that can be availed by the user pursuant to this Promotion is Rs.600.
    • The Discount Coupon cannot be clubbed with any other offers, cash bonus available with the user.
    • The Discount Coupon will expire in 72 hours from the time it’s given to the user.

      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      75 50
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion.
    • A user shall be eligible for the Promotion bonus amount for up to first 50 deposits made through card(s) only.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on March 13th,2019.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 2,500. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit 50 times.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  14. Social Quiz: Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This "Social Quiz: Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be five multiple choice quiz questions based on sports trivia that will be posted by the Dream11 official page at hourly intervals on the social feed on March 18th 2020. Users will be prompted to respond to the quiz questions using reactions and for each quiz question, 500 lucky winners who provide the correct answer via a reaction will be awarded a cash bonus amount of INR 50 each.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the post shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on March 18th, 2020 till IST 18:59:59 hours on March 18th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that only the reactions made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any reactions that are made by the user before or after the Promotion Period.
    • A user can receive the bonus amount as much as 5 times given that he is selected as one of the 500 lucky winners for his correctly given answer for each quiz question independently.
    • Winner(s) shall be randomly selected through a draw, from among the users who correctly answer the quiz question.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winners of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on March 19th,2020.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 250 given that you have been selected as a lucky winner for all of the 5 quiz questions posted.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  17. On this day March 30th: Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This "On this day March 30th: Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be one quiz question posted based on a historical sports fact by the Dream11 official page on the social feed on March 30th 2020. Users will be prompted to respond to the quiz question by posting on their feed using the hashtag #OnThisDay and the 500 first posts that have the correct answer will be awarded a cash bonus amount of INR 100 each.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the post shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 17:00:00 hours on March 30th, 2020 till IST 12:00:00 hours on March 31st, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that only the posts made by a user during the Promotion Period using the #OnThisDay hashtag shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any posts that are either made by the user before or after the Promotion Period or that do not contain that specific hashtag.
    • A user can receive the bonus amount only once, and those users who post multiple times to answer this question will only have their latest post up until the Promotion period considered as their final answer.
    • Winner(s) shall be selected based on the first 500 to correctly answer the quiz question, from among all the users who correctly answer the quiz question.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winners of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on March 31st,2020.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 100 given that you are among the first 500 users to correctly post their answer on the feed.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  20. Brackets: Clash of the Captains: Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This "Clash of the Captains Challenge" ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts pertaining to the challenge shared by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application.

    Winners in the Challenge will win Rs.250 each.

    How to play & win in the Brackets: Clash of the Captains Challenge:

    • User’s will be invited to predict who will be the winner of the Clash of the Captains challenge between 4 captains. Each captain will compete against each other for the maximum reactions over six successive rounds until a single winner is declared. The Prediction Window ("Prediction Window") will be from 12:00:00 hours IST on April 3rd 2020 until 19:59:59 hours on April 3rd, 2020.
    • Users will make their prediction for the final winner through reactions on a specified post by the Dream11 official page in the specified prediction window. No reactions made after the prediction window will be taken into consideration when deciding the winners.
    • There will be a total of 3 rounds and each round consists of two matches, and the duration of each match is 2 hours. Each match will be between two captains, and the winner will progress to the next round. In total there will be 6 matches. There will only be a single winner at the end of the 3 rounds. 10,000 users who are the first to predict the correct winner at the end will receive Cash Bonus of INR 250.
    • In the event where multiple captains have the same number of points, the total number of votes collected by each captain during the course of the 3 rounds, will be measured as a tie-breaker.
    • Prizes will be awarded to the first 10,000 people to correctly predict the correct Winning Captain within the Prediction Window.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Challenge:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Challenge is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the post shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Challenge, you agree to comply with these Terms and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Challenge will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on April 3rd, 2020 till IST 21:59:59 hours on April 4th, 2020 ("Challenge Period"). Please note that the Prediction window will only be open from 12:00:00 hours on April 3rd 2020 until 19:59:59 hours on April 3rd, 2020 ("Prediction Window").
    • Please note that only the reactions made by a user during the Prediction Window to predict the correct captain shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any reactions that are made by the user after the Prediction Window.
    • A user can receive the bonus amount only once given that he is selected as one of the 10,000 first users to correctly predict who will be the top reacted captain.
    • For the purpose of determining a user’s prediction, any user who changes his vote after “Prediction window” has elapsed will be disqualified from being considered as a winner in the Brackets: Clash of the Captains Challenge:
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winners of the Challenge, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Challenge.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, Winner Declaration and the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on April 7th,2020.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Challenge is INR 250.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  21. Name the Game April 8th : Promotion

    This "Name the Game April 8th: Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be five quiz questions posted based on historical sports matches that will be posted by the Dream11 official page on the social feed on April 8th 2020. Users will be prompted to respond to the quiz questions by taking a screenshot of the Dream11 post that has the specific quiz question and posting it on their feed using the hashtag #NameTheGame and the 2000 first posts per question that have the correct answer in the caption of this post will be awarded a cash bonus amount of INR 50 each.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the post shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on April 8th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on April 8th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that only the posts made by a user during the Promotion Period using the #NameTheGame hashtag shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any posts that are either made by the user before or after the Promotion Period or that do not contain that specific hashtag.
    • A user can receive the bonus amount upto five times, and those users who post multiple times to answer a single question will only have their latest post per question up until the Promotion period considered as their final answer.
    • Winner(s) shall be selected based on the first 2000 to correctly answer the quiz question, from among all the users who correctly answer the quiz question.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winners of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on April 10th, 2020.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 250 given that you are among the first 2000 users to correctly post their answer on the feed for all 5 quiz questions.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  23. DPL Weekly Leaderboard Week 1 Campaign: TnCs

    The Dream11 Premier League Weekly Week 1 ( Week 1 Sunday 12th April to Sunday 19th April) Challenge (“Challenge”) is open to all existing users of Dream11 who receive notification, view a banner on the home page or view a post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 social feed from the Dream11 mobile application. On receiving such notification, users who visit the Official Dream11 Page and participate in the Dream11 Premier League game shall stand a chance to win Cash Bonus rewards.

    How to play

    • The Dream11 Premier League will be played from 12th April, 2020 to April 30th, 2020 with 8 teams vying to become the first-ever DPL champion on the basis of fan’s votes.
    • After the prediction window of the match elapses, the match will begin at which point users would need to go to the Dream11 social feed and cast their vote as a reaction on the match post that has been shared by the Dream11 official page. Users shall cast their vote only during the voting period. Only votes cast during the match voting period will be considered.
    • Only users who predict ALL matches in a day correctly and vote on the appropriate match posts on the Dream11 social feed will be eligible to win the INR 100 CB. If there is only one match per day, then the user only has to predict a single match to be eligible to receive the INR 100 CB, and if there are two matches in a day then users need to correctly predict the outcome for BOTH matches (the user needs to win both matches of the day) in order to be eligible to win the Rs 100 CB as a daily prize. Additionally, the user would need to vote on the match post by the Dream11 page, which would be posted anytime between 3 and 3:30 pm and will continue until 6:30 pm for the first match of the day, and anytime between 7pm and 7:30pm until 10:30 for the second match of the day, to be eligible for the INR 100 CB prize.
    • Every correct prediction accrues 50 points on the weekly and season long leaderboards to the user.
    • All the details about how to play the Dream11 Premier League are below:

    Step 1: Make your prediction before the match deadline on the DPL match centre

    • We will host matches everyday with a fixed prediction window that starts at 12:00 PM. You can tap on the DPL banner on the Dream11 App’s home page and choose the match that you want to make your prediction for.
    • Your prediction will have to include the match winner, as well as how many votes the team will win by in the final match voting process. For example, for a Mumbai vs Chennai match, you could predict that Mumbai will win by more than 10,000 votes.
    • For matches that begin anytime between 3 PM and 3:30 PM, the prediction window will close at 3:00 PM. Similarly, for matches anytime between 7 PM and 7:30 PM, the prediction window shuts at 7:00 PM.

    Step 2: Vote for your favorite team by reacting on the Match feed post made by the Dream11 page

    • Each match will have a voting window on the Dream11 Feed after the prediction window deadline. Head to the Dream11 page on the Feed to vote for the team that you think will win a match during the match timings. The way that you vote is through selecting a reaction on a feed post by the Dream11 page.

    Winning Criteria for the Week 1 Leaderboard

    • In this challenge users who score the maximum points by the end of Week 1, on April 19th 23:59:59 hours by participating in the Challenge shall be eligible to receive Cash Bonus as per the points scored (defined below).
      Points Required Cash Bonus Reward per user Maximum Number of Users Prize Pool
      625 2,000 500 10,00,000
      525 250 2,000 5,00,000
      425 50 20,000 10,00,000
    • The weekly Week 1 challenge will be starting from Sunday April 12th 2020 at 12:00:00 hours IST and end on Sunday April 19th, 2020 at 23:59:59 hours. In the event that there are more winners per category (as shown in the above table) than the total number of winners per category specified in the above table, then the Cash Bonus Prize Pool amount shown on the above table will be split between all the winners of the Week 1 leaderboard in equal amounts.
    • Users must predict which team will win and by how many reactions per match. For every match, the closest prediction to the correct answer will be the winning prediction and all users who select this option will be awarded 50 points that will accrue towards their points on the Week 1 Leaderboard. Please note that any reactions accrued on the match before or after the match duration will not be taken into consideration when deciding which team has won and by how many reactions. Any changes made to reactions after the match has completed will not be considered at all.
    • The winners for the weekly challenge will be announced by April 20th 2020 at 23:59:59 hours.
    • Please note that only the users who have achieved the required points as per the above table, shall be eligible to receive the Cash Bonus.
    • Cash Bonus shall be credited to the winners of the Week 1 leaderboard by 23:59:59 hours IST on April 20th 2020.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to modify the prize of the challenge at its sole discretion.
    • Unutilised Cash Bonus expires within 30 days from the date of credit.

  24. Dream11 Premier League Daily Winners TnCs

    Dream11 Premier League Daily Challenge (Sunday 12th April to Thursday 30th April) (“Challenge”), is open to all existing users of Dream11 who receive notification, view a banner on the home page or view a post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 social feed from the Dream11 mobile application. On receiving such notification, users who visit the Official Dream11 Page and participate in the Dream11 Premier League game shall stand a chance to win Cash Bonus rewards.

    How to play

    • The Dream11 Premier League will be played from 12th April, 2020 to April 30th with 8 teams vying to become the first-ever DPL champion on the basis of fan’s votes.
    • Each day the prediction window will open at 12PM, at which point users can cast their prediction on which team (out of the teams playing in the match) will win the fans’ choice match and by how many votes, which will be accrued as feed reactions on a single post.
    • After the prediction window of the match elapses, the match will begin at which point users would need to go to the Dream11 social feed and cast their vote as a reaction on the match post that has been shared by the Dream11 official page. . Only votes cast during the match voting period will be considered.
    • Only users who predict ALL matches in a day correctly and vote on the appropriate match posts on the Dream11 social feed will be eligible to win the INR 100 CB. If there is only one match per day, then the user only has to predict a single match to be eligible to receive the INR 100 CB, and if there are two matches in a day then users need to correctly predict the outcome for BOTH matches (the user needs to win both matches of the day) in order to be eligible to win the Rs 100 CB as a daily prize. Additionally, the user would need to vote on the match post by the Dream11 page, which would be posted anytime between 3 and 3:30 pm and will continue until 6:30 pm for the first match of the day, and anytime between 7pm and 7:30pm until 10:30 for the second match of the day, to be eligible for the INR 100 CB prize.
    • Along with the daily prizes, there are also weekly and season long prizes which are won based on crossing a certain cumulative points threshold. Points can be accrued by users by correctly predicting the outcome of a match. Every correct prediction accrues 50 points to the user.
    • All the details about how to play the Dream11 Premier League are below:

    Step 1: Make your prediction before the match deadline on the DPL match centre

    • We will host matches everyday with a fixed prediction window that starts at 12:00 PM. You can tap on the DPL banner on the Dream11 App’s home page and choose the match that you want to make your prediction for.
    • Your prediction will have to include the match winner, as well as how many votes the team will win by in the final match voting process. For example, for a Mumbai vs Chennai match, you could predict that Mumbai will win by more than 10,000 votes.
    • For matches that begin anytime between 3 PM and 3:30 PM, the prediction window will close at 3:00 PM. Similarly, for matches anytime between 7 PM and 7:30 PM, the prediction window shuts at 7:00 PM.

    Step 2: Vote for your favorite team by reacting on the Match feed post made by the Dream11 page

    • Each match will have a voting window on the Dream11 Feed after the prediction window deadline. Head to the Dream11 page on the Feed to vote for the team that you think will win a match during the match timings. The way that you vote is through reactions on a feed post by the Dream11 page.

    Winning Criteria for Daily prizes

    • All users who correctly predict the correct answer for all matches in a day will be declared as daily winners and will receive INR 100 worth of Cash Bonus. In the event that more than 10,000 users are daily winners for any single day, the total prize pool of INR CB 10,00,000 will be split equally amongst all the daily winners for that day.
    • This Daily Winners challenge will be starting from Sunday April 12th 2020 and continue until April 30th 2020.
    • Users must predict which team will win and by how many reactions per match. For every match, the closest prediction to the correct answer will be the winning prediction and all users who select this option will be awarded 50 points that will accrue towards respective leaderboards (Week 1, Week 2 & Season Long Leaderboards). Please note that any reactions accrued on the match before or after the match duration will not be taken into consideration when deciding which team has won and by how many reactions. Any changes made to reactions after the match has completed will not be considered at all.
    • The winners for the daily prize will be announced within 24 hours of the end of the day’s last match. Cash Bonus rewards for daily winners will be credited to users’ accounts within 24 hours of the end of the day’s last match.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to modify the prize of the challenge at its sole discretion.
    • Unutilised Cash Bonus expires within 30 days from the date of credit.

  25. Dream11 Premier League Season Long Winners TnCs

    Dream11 Premier League Season Long Challenge (Sunday 12th April to Thursday 30th April) (“Challenge”), is open to all existing users of Dream11 who receive notification, view a banner on the home page or view a post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 social feed from the Dream11 mobile application. On receiving such notification, users who visit the Official Dream11 Page and participate in the Dream11 Premier League game shall stand a chance to win rewards.

    How to play

    • The Dream11 Premier League will be played from 12th April, 2020 to April 30th, 2020 with 8 teams vying to become the first-ever DPL champion on the basis of fan’s votes.
    • Each day the prediction window will open at 12PM, at which point users can cast their prediction on which team (out of the teams playing in the match) will win the fan’s choice match and by how many votes, which will be accrued as feed reactions on a single post.
    • After the prediction window of the match elapses, the match will begin at which point users would need to go to the Dream11 social feed and cast their vote as a reaction on the match post that has been shared by the Dream11 official page. Users shall cast their vote only during the voting period. Only votes cast during the match voting period will be considered.
    • Only users who predict ALL matches in a day correctly and vote on the appropriate match posts on the Dream11 social feed will be eligible to win the INR 100 CB. If there is only one match per day, then the user only has to predict a single match to be eligible to receive the INR 100 CB, and if there are two matches in a day then users need to correctly predict the outcome for BOTH matches (the user needs to win both matches of the day) in order to be eligible to win the Rs 100 CB as a daily prize. Additionally, the user would need to vote on the match post by the Dream11 page, which would be posted anytime between 3 and 3:30 pm and will continue until 6:30 pm for the first match of the day, and anytime between 7pm and 7:30pm until 10:30 for the second match of the day, to be eligible for the INR 100 CB prize.
    • Every correct prediction accrues 50 points on the weekly and season long leaderboards to the user.
    • All the details about how to play the Dream11 Premier League are below:

    Step 1: Make your prediction before the match deadline on the DPL match centre

    • We will host matches everyday with a fixed prediction window that starts at 12:00 PM. You can tap on the DPL banner on the Dream11 App’s home page and choose the match that you want to make your prediction for.
    • Your prediction will have to include the match winner, as well as how many votes the team will win by in the final match voting process. For example, for a Mumbai vs Chennai match, you could predict that Mumbai will win by more than 10,000 votes.
    • For matches that begin anytime between 3 PM and 3:30 PM, the prediction window will close at 3:00 PM. Similarly, for matches anytime between 7 PM and 7:30 PM, the prediction window shuts at 7:00 PM.

    Step 2: Vote for your favorite team by reacting on the Match feed post made by the Dream11 page

    • Each match will have a voting window on the Dream11 Feed after the prediction window deadline. Head to the Dream11 page on the Feed to vote for the team that you think will win a match during the match timings. The way that you vote is through selecting a reaction on a feed post by the Dream11 page.

    Winning Criteria for Season Long prizes

    • All users who accumulate 1425 points or more by correctly predicting answers and winning points on the season long leaderboard are eligible to win INR 10,000 which be credited to their Dream11 winnings balance by May 3rd 2020, 23:59:59 hours. In the event that more than 1000 users have 1425 points or more at the end of the campaign, the total prize pool of INR 1,00,00,000 will be split equally amongst all the Season Long winners.
    • Additionally, all users who accumulate 975 points or more by correctly predicting answers and winning points on the season long leaderboard are eligible to win INR 1,000 which be credited to their Dream11 winnings balance by May 3rd 2020, 23:59:59 hours. In the event that more than 2000 users have 975 points or more at the end of the campaign, the total prize pool of INR 20,00,000 will be split equally amongst all the Season Long winners.
    • This challenge will be starting from Sunday April 12th 2020 and continue until April 30th 2020.
    • Users must predict which team will win and by how many reactions per match. For every match, the closest prediction to the correct answer will be the winning prediction and all users who select this option will be awarded 50 points that will accrue towards their points on the season long Leaderboard. Please note that any reactions accrued on the match before or after the match duration will not be taken into consideration when deciding which team has won and by how many reactions. Any changes made to reactions after the match has completed will not be considered at all.
    • The winners for the season long prize will be announced by May 3rd 2020, 23:59:59 hours. The prize for the season long winners will be credited to users’ Dream11 winning balance by May 3rd 2020, 23:59:59 hours.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to modify the prize of the challenge at its sole discretion.
