  27. DPL Promotion: Play any DPL Match, unlock Rs. 11 Contests!

    This Dream11 Premier League Promotion: Play any DPL Match, unlock Rs. 11 Contests is available to all users who receive notification, view a banner on the home page, or view a post by the Dream11 official page.

    On receiving such notification, any users who play any DPL match by taking the prediction poll from the Dream11 Premier League match centre during the Promotion Period, will unlock exclusive contests for such users only, which have an entry fee of Rs. 11 across all Baseball matches on the Dream11 platform (“Exclusive Contests”). Users shall be able to view Exclusive Contests, within 6 hours of playing their first Dream11 Premier League match. This offer is only valid for users who play their first Dream11 Premier League match during the Promotion Period. Those users who have already played any Dream11 Premier League match will not be eligible to receive this offer.

    Please note that a user is considered to have played a match in the Dream11 Premier league if they have taken a poll from the Dream11 Premier League match centre.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on April 24th , 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on Apr 30th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • The Exclusive Contests shall only be active for users till May 10th, 2020, 22:00:00 hours only.
    • The Prize Pool for each Exclusive Contest shall be INR 100 (INR Hundred Only).
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 10,00,000 (Ten Lakh) users who play the Dream11 Premier League for the first time within the Promotion Period. .

  28. DPL Promotion: React on 7 DPL Match Posts, unlock Rs. 7 Contests!

    This Dream11 Premier League Promotion: React on 7 DPL Match Posts, unlock Rs. 7 Contests is available to all users who receive notification, view a banner on the home page, or view a post by the Dream11 official page.

    On receiving such notification, any users who react to 7 or more DPL match posts on the Dream11 social feed during the Promotion Period, will unlock exclusive contests for such users only, which have an entry fee of Rs. 7 across all Baseball matches(“Exclusive Contests”) on the Dream11 platform. Users shall be able to view Exclusive Contests within 6 hours of reacting on their 7th Dream11 Premier League match post. Any users who complete reacting to 7 matches after the Promotion Period is over will not be eligible to receive this offer.

    Please note that a user is considered to have played a match in the Dream11 Premier league if they have taken a poll from the Dream11 Premier League match centre.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on April 24th , 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on Apr 30th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • The Exclusive Contests shall only be active for users till May 10th, 2020, 22:00:00 hours only.
    • The Prize Pool for each Exclusive Contest shall be INR 50 (INR Fifty Only).
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 10,00,000 (Ten Lakh) users who react to 11 match posts of the Dream11 Premier League within the Promotion Period.

  29. DPL Promotion: Play 7 DPL Matches, unlock Rs. 5 Contests!

    This Dream11 Premier League Promotion: Play 7 Dream11 Premier League Matches, unlock Rs. 5 Contests is available to all users who receive notification, view a banner on the home page, or view a post by the Dream11 official page.

    On receiving such notification, any users who play 7 or more DPL matches during the Promotion Period, will unlock exclusive contests for such users only, which have an entry fee of Rs. 5 across all Baseball matches (“Exclusive Contests”) on the Dream11 platform. Users shall be able to view Exclusive Contests, within 6 hours of playing their 7th Dream11 Premier League match. Any users who complete playing 7 matches after the Promotion Period is over will not be eligible to receive this offer.

    Please note that a user is considered to have played a match in the Dream11 Premier league if they have taken a poll from the Dream11 Premier League match centre.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on April 24th , 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on Apr 30th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • The Exclusive Contests shall be active for users till May 10th, 2020, 20:00 hours only.
    • The Prize Pool for each Exclusive Contest shall be INR 50 (INR Fifty Only).
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 10,00,000 (Ten Lakh) users who play 7 matches of the Dream11 Premier League within the Promotion Period.

  30. Dream11 Premier League First Time Winners Bonus TnCs

    Dream11 Premier League First Time Match Winners Bonus Challenge (Wednesday 22nd April 2020 to Saturday 25th April 2020) (“Challenge”), is open to all existing users of Dream11 who have not yet participated in a single Dream11 Premier League or have not yet won a single match of the Dream11 Premier League. As such users who have exactly 0 total points accumulated across all matches in the Dream11 Premier League would be eligible. These users would receive specific notification or view a banner on the Dream11 Home page notifying them about this promotion. On receiving such notification, users who participate in the Dream11 Premier League by making a match prediction and getting it correct, are eligible to earn INR 25 Cash Bonus. The offer will be applicable from Wednesday, 22nd April 2020 12:00PM until Saturday 25th April 2020, 11:59 PM.

    How to play the Dream11 Premier League

    • The Dream11 Premier League will be played from 12th April, 2020 to April 30th with 8 teams vying to become the first-ever DPL champion on the basis of fan’s votes.
    • Each day the prediction window will open at 12PM, at which point users can cast their prediction on which team (out of the teams playing in the match) will win the fans’ choice match and by how many votes, which will be accrued as feed reactions on a single post.
    • After the prediction window of the match elapses, the match will begin at which point users would need to go to the Dream11 social feed and cast their vote as a reaction on the match post that has been shared by the Dream11 official page. Users shall cast their vote only during the voting period. Only votes cast during the match voting period will be considered.
    • Only users who predict ALL matches in a day correctly and vote on the appropriate match posts on the Dream11 social feed will be eligible to win the INR 100 CB. If there is only one match per day, then the user only has to predict a single match to be eligible to receive the INR 100 CB, and if there are two matches in a day then users need to correctly predict the outcome for BOTH matches (the user needs to win both matches of the day) in order to be eligible to win the Rs 100 CB as a daily prize. Additionally, the user would need to vote on the match post by the Dream11 page, which would be posted anytime between 3 and 3:30 pm and will continue until 6:30 pm for the first match of the day, and anytime between 7pm and 7:30pm until 10:30 for the second match of the day, to be eligible for the INR 100 CB prize.
    • Along with the daily prizes, there are also weekly and season long prizes which are won based on crossing a certain cumulative points threshold. Points can be accrued by users by correctly predicting the outcome of a match. Every correct prediction accrues 50 points to the user.
    • All the details about how to play the Dream11 Premier League are below:

    Step 1: Make your prediction before the match deadline on the DPL match centre

    • We will host matches everyday with a fixed prediction window that starts at 12:00 PM. You can tap on the DPL banner on the Dream11 App’s home page and choose the match that you want to make your prediction for.
    • Your prediction will have to include the match winner, as well as how many votes the team will win by in the final match voting process. For example, for a Mumbai vs Chennai match, you could predict that Mumbai will win by more than 10,000 votes.
    • For matches that begin anytime between 3 PM and 3:30 PM, the prediction window will close at 3:00 PM. Similarly, for matches anytime between 7 PM and 7:30 PM, the prediction window shuts at 7:00 PM.

    Step 2: Vote for your favorite team by reacting on the Match feed post made by the Dream11 page

    • Each match will have a voting window on the Dream11 Feed after the prediction window deadline. Head to the Dream11 page on the Feed to vote for the team that you think will win a match during the match timings. The way that you vote is through reactions on a feed post by the Dream11 page.

    Winning Criteria for First Time Winner Bonus prizes

    • For the purpose of this promotion alone, any users who play the Dream11 Premier League between Wednesday 22nd April, 2020 12:00:00 hours and Saturday 25th April, 2020 23:59:59 hours will be eligible to win INR 25 Cash Bonus upon winning their first Dream11 Premier League match.
    • Only the first 200,000 users to correctly win a match for the first time within this promotion period (Wednesday April 22nd, 2020 until Saturday 25th April, 2020) will receive the INR 25 Cash Bonus.This will be rewarded on users’ first win only from Wednesday April 22nd, 2020 until Saturday 25th April, 2020 , and not for any subsequent wins in the Dream11 Premier League.
    • No changes apply to the points system. Any correct prediction by a user during this window will also accrue 50 points only, as per the general Dream11 Premier League rules.
    • This First Time Winner Bonus challenge will be starting from Wednesday April 22nd, 2020 and continue until Saturday April 25th 2020 23:59:59 hours.
    • Users must predict which team will win and by how many reactions per match. For every match, the closest prediction to the correct answer will be the winning prediction and all users who select this option will be awarded 50 points that will accrue towards respective leaderboards (Week 1, Week 2 & Season Long Leaderboards). Please note that any reactions accrued on the match before or after the match duration will not be taken into consideration when deciding which team has won and by how many reactions. Any changes made to reactions after the match has completed will not be considered at all.
    • Cash Bonus rewards for the first winner bonus winners will be credited to users’ accounts by Monday 27th April 2020 23:59:59 hours.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to modify the prize of the challenge at its sole discretion.
    • Unutilised Cash Bonus expires within 30 days from the date of credit.

  31. Dream11 April 2020 Deposit Bonus Offer Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This "Dream11 April 2020 Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 19:00:00 hours on April 25th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on April 26th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      999 111
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on April 27th,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 111. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit once.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  32. Be an All-rounder (Cash Bonus Offer)

    This Cash Bonus Offer is open to select users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, users who join contests worth minimum of Rs.200 in each sport and participate in atleast 3 sports out of 4 (from Basketball, Baseball, Cricket and Football) during the Promotion Period shall be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on May 2nd, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on May 3rd 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, users must join contests worth minimum of Rs.200 in each sport and participate in atleast 3 sports out of 4 (from Basketball, Baseball, Cricket and Football) during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus
    • The Cash Bonus will be sent to the qualifying users by 23:59:59 on May 5th.
    • Each qualifying user will be credited Rs.300 in their respective cash bonus account.
    • The user can avail the offer only once during the offer period.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus that can be availed by the user pursuant to this Promotion is Rs.300.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other offers, cash bonus available with the user.
    • The Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the time it’s given to the user.

  33. Baseball Quiz: Promotion

    This "Baseball Quiz: Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be five multiple choice quiz questions based on baseball sports trivia that will be posted by the Dream11 official page at hourly intervals on the social feed on May 6th, 2020. Users will be prompted to respond to the quiz questions using reactions and for each quiz question, 1000 first users who provide the correct answer via a reaction within the promotion period will be awarded a Free Entry coupon amounting to INR 35 each for any baseball game.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the post shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 15:00:00 hours on May 6th, 2020 till IST 19:59:59 hours on May 6th 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that only the reactions made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Coupon and not any reactions that are made by the user before or after the Promotion Period.
    • In the event that a user changes their reaction for a quiz question, only their latest reaction before the end of the promotion period will be considered.
    • A user can only receive the discount coupon once for this promotion, even if he is amongst the first 1000 winners of multiple quiz questions. For eg- if you have already won for a prior question, then you cannot win again even if you are within the first 1000 to answer correctly.
    • The discount coupon would be applicable on any baseball game and would be valid till IST 23:59:59 hours on May 18th,2020.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winners of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Discount Coupon will be credited into your Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on May 8th,2020.

  34. Dream11 May 2020 Deposit Bonus Offer

    This "Dream11 May 2020 Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner Deposit 999 get 222. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 19:00:00 hours on May 13th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on May 15th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      999 222
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on May 16th,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 222. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit once.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  39. Vincy Premier League (Cash Bonus Offer)

    This Cash Bonus Offer is open to select users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, users who join contests amounting to a minimum of Rs.100 in every match and participates in atleast 7 games out of 15 games of Vincy Premier League during the Promotion Period shall be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on May 27th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on May 31st 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, users must join contests amounting to a minimum of Rs. 100 in each match and participate in atleast 7 out of 15 Vincy Premier League games during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus.
    • If any of the matches get abandoned, those matches won’t be considered for the promotion.
    • The Cash Bonus will be sent to the qualifying users by 23:59:59 on June 2nd.
    • Each qualifying user will be credited Rs.250 in their respective cash bonus account if they play between 7 - 12 games of Vincy Premier League during the Promotion Period.
    • Users who play 13 or more games of Vincy Premier League during the Promotion Period shall receive Rs. 1000 in their Cash Bonus Account.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus that can be availed by the user pursuant to this Promotion is Rs.1000.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • The Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date it’s given to the user.

  40. Vincy Premier League Quiz: Promotion

    This "Vincy Premier League Quiz: Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be five multiple choice quiz questions based on cricket sports trivia that will be posted by the Dream11 official page at hourly intervals on the social feed during the Promotion Period on May 27th, 2020. Users will be prompted to respond to the quiz questions using reactions. Users need to answer all 5 quiz questions correctly in order to be eligible to win the Cash Bonus prize. There can be upto 10,000 total winners for this Promotion, who will each get INR 50 Cash Bonus. If there are more than 10,000 winners to answer all 5 quiz questions correctly within the Promotion Period, only the first 10,000 users who have answered all questions correctly will be eligible to win the INR 50 Cash Bonus prize. If the number of users who answer all 5 questions correctly during the Promotion Period is less than 10,000 then all the eligible winners will equally share the total prize pool of INR 500,000.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the post shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on May 27th, 2020 till IST 21:59:59 hours on May 27th 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that only the reactions made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Cash Bonus and not any reactions that are made by the user before or after the Promotion Period.
    • In the event that a user changes their reaction for a quiz question, only their latest reaction before the end of the Promotion Period will be considered.
    • A user can only receive the Cash Bonus prize once for this Promotion and only if he is one of the 10,000 first users to answer all 5 quiz questions correctly within the Promotion Period.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winners of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Cash Bonus will be credited into your Account by IST 23:59:59 hours by May 29th,2020.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the post shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on June 17th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on June 17th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that only the reactions made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Cash Bonus and not any reactions that are made by the user before or after the Promotion Period.
    • In the event that a user changes their reaction for a quiz question, only their latest reaction before the end of the Promotion Period will be considered.
    • A user can only receive the Cash Bonus prize once for this Promotion and only if he is one of the 100,000 first users to answer all 5 quiz questions correctly within the Promotion Period.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winners of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Cash Bonus will be credited into your Account by IST 23:59:59 hours by June 19th,2020.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  45. Dream11 June 2020 Deposit Bonus Offer

    This "Dream11 June 2020 Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who receive communications of the offer from Dream11 via in app banner. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 19:00:00 hours on June 18th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on June 20th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      20,000 4,000
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above-listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on June 21st,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 4,000. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit once.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 5,000 (Five Thousand) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms, the first 5,000 (Five Thousand) users shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  47. Dream11 First Deposit Bonus Offer June 2020

    This "First Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to select new users of Dream11 who have registered on the Dream11 app before and during the Promotion Period and have never made a deposit on Dream11 (“user”). Under this Promotion, users who make their first Qualifying Deposit of minimum INR 25 during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those users who receive communications of the offer from Dream11 via in app banner and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 10:00:00 hours on June 19th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on July 31st , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of minimum INR 25 or above ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount which is equal to your Qualifying Deposit or Rs 100, whichever is lower.
    • Please note that only the first Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for your first Qualifying Deposit amount.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on July 31st, 2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 100.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 3,00,000 (Three Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  49. 1983 World Cup Quiz: Promotion

    This "1983 World Cup Quiz: Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 5 multiple choice quiz questions based on cricket sports trivia that will be posted by the Dream11 official page at hourly intervals on the social feed during the Promotion Period on June 25th, 2020. Users will be prompted to respond to the quiz questions using reactions. Users need to answer all 5 quiz questions correctly in order to be eligible to win the Cash Bonus prize. There can be upto 50,000 total winners for this Promotion, who will each get INR 10 Cash Bonus. If there are more than 50,000 winners to answer all 5 quiz questions correctly within the Promotion Period, only the first 50,000 users who have answered all questions correctly will be eligible to win the INR 10 Cash Bonus prize. If the number of users who answer all 5 questions correctly during the Promotion Period is less than 50,000, then all the eligible winners will equally share the total prize pool of INR 5,00,000.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the post shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on June 25th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on June 25th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that only the reactions made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Cash Bonus and not any reactions that are made by the user before or after the Promotion Period.
    • In the event that a user changes their reaction for a quiz question, only their latest reaction before the end of the Promotion Period will be considered.
    • A user can only receive the Cash Bonus prize once for this Promotion and only if he is one of the 50,000 first users to answer all 5 quiz questions correctly within the Promotion Period.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winners of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Cash Bonus will be credited into your Account by IST 23:59:59 hours by June 27th,2020.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

If the number of users who answer all 5 questions correctly during the Promotion Period is less than 50,000, then all the eligible winners will equally share the total prize pool of INR 5,00,000.

    • In the event that a user changes their reaction for a quiz question, only their latest reaction before the end of the Promotion Period will be considered.

  51. Dream11 MSD39NotOut

    • Participation in this contest is purely voluntary.
    • As on the date of participation, the Participant must be a resident of India and must be 18 years or above in age.
    • Participant must be following Dream11 on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram on the date of such participation.
    • The Participant(s) who shares images, videos or texts on social media platforms through Facebook comments, direct messages, uploads on personal feed, tweets, direct messages, Instagram uploads on feeds, stories, direct messages and Dream11 App feed will be eligible for the contest.
    • The content of the video, image, post shall be related to the following:
      • A video of the participant imitating the helicopter shot of MS Dhoni.
      • Selfies or images with him that are not morphed, photoshopped or edited.
      • Screenshot of the team which had Mahendra Singh Dhoni in it and such team won the Fantasy contest game.
      • Participant having any hairstyle as Mahendra Singh Dhoni.
      • Participant having unique chant for Mahendra Singh Dhoni.
      • Participants owning a jersey with the name of Mahendra Singh Dhoni.
      • Any participant who watched Mahendra Singh Dhoni LIVE in action can share such a video.
    • All participants have to mention Dream11 and use the hashtag#MSD39NotOut to qualify. Failing to do so will result in disqualification.
    • 11 unique entries from all the entries received from 4th July 2020 to 6th July 2020 shall stand to win gift vouchers.
    • Dream11’s decision as to the declaration of winners shall be final and can not be disputed.
    • By participating in this contest, participants agree to be bound by the TERMS AND CONDITIONS of the contest.

  55. FanCode Watch Live Promotion Terms and Conditions

    This "FanCode Watch Live Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who join any paid contest of Emirates D10 tournament starting from 24th July 2020 to 7th August 2020.Under this Promotion, users who join any paid contests of Emirate D10 with a cumulative Entry Fee of Rs. 50, shall be eligible to watch the match live for Free on Dream11 post the deadline.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions(accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms andConditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 1600 hours on July 24th,2020 till IST 2359 hours on 7th August 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Users who have not joined the contests with a cumulative Entry Fee of Rs. 50, can still watch the match live by purchasing the match pass on FanCode.
    • Any purchases for the match pass or the tour pass by a user on the FanCode application and subsequently joining any paid contests with a cumulative Entry Fee of Rs. 50, shall not be eligible to under this Promotion.
    • In the event of match being abandoned, entry fee paid by the users shall be refunded as per the standard policy of Dream11.
    • In the event of any refunds applicable to the users who have paid on FanCode to watch the live stream on Dream11, refund policy of FanCode shall be applicable.
    • Dream11 shall not be liable for any refund of entry fees or any amounts paid by the user to purchase the match pass on FanCode in the event of any technical challenges faced by the users to watch the matchlive on Dream11 app. All refunds of match pass shall be processed by FanCode as per FanCode’srefund policy.

  56. Dream11 Desktop Website Promotion

    This "Dream11 Website Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on their Dream11 app. Under this Promotion, users must make at least one team on the Dream11 website and join any paid contest from the website during the Promotion Period (defined below). Eligible users who create and submit their team using the website of Dream11 for any paid contest during the Promotion Period shall be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus amount of Rs.25 ("Cash Bonus")

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who receive the communication from the Company regarding this offer and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 11:00:00 hours on July 30th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on August 14th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that the Cash Bonus shall be credited into the users Cash Bonus Account only once for the first team that is created and submitted to join a paid contest during the promotion period.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on August 16th, 2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is Rs.25.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (1 Lakh) users who join any paid contest from the website of Dream11 during the Promotion Period.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  57. Dream11 August 2020 Deposit Bonus Offer

    This "Dream11 August 2020 Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 15:00:00 hours on Aug 6th, 2020 till IST 23:59:00 hours on Aug 7th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      7,777 3,333
      5,555 2,222
      777 333
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on Aug 8th,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 5,888. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit once.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  58. Dream11 Paid Private Contest Creator Promotion

    This "Paid Private Contest Creator Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who are above loyalty level 200 and are PAN and Bank Account Verified. ("User") Under this Promotion, Users who organise paid private contests of minimum fifty (50) participants to a maximum of five hundred (500) participants, shall be eligible to receive Cash Bonus equivalent to two percent (2%) of the total prize pool of the contest ("Cash Bonus").

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those users who are above loyalty level 200 and whose account is verified with PAN and bank details.
    • The User shall not have any history of fair play violation, fraudulent transactions, misconduct complaints received on the Dream11 platform.
    • User must at all times comply with Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 10:00:00 hours on August 14th , 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on 13th September , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Users who participate in the promotion and fulfil all the criteria shall receive 2% of the total prize pool in their Cash Bonus Account on a fortnightly basis for the number of paid private contests created in the preceding week. The Contest Creator Bonus will be paid from the platform fees generated by Dream11, and will not affect the winning amounts that contest participants earn.
    • In the event of any match getting cancelled and/or abandoned, the contest shall be cancelled, and all amounts paid for such contest shall be refunded.
    • Cash Bonus shall be valid for a period of 30 days from the date of credit.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to block any user from organising paid private contest and withhold the Cash Bonus, if it is found that paid private contests are created fraudulently.

    This "Independence Day Flash Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in app communication.     Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 18:00:00 hours on 15th August, 2020 till IST 18:30:00 hours on 15th August, 2020 (“Promotion Period 1”); and 20:00:00 hours on 15th August, 2020 till IST 20:30:00 hours on 15th August, 2020 (“Promotion Period 2”) (collectively referred as "Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the active Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Promotion Period 1
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      7 15
      Promotion Period 2
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      10 20
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • The maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during each of the Promotion Period is set to a total of 10 Qualifying Deposits. For avoidance of doubt, it is clarified that a user can participate in this Promotion during each Promotion Period by making 10 successful Qualifying Deposit in each Promotion Period.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion and in each Promotion Period is INR150 and INR 200 respectively. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit 10 qualifying deposit in each Promotion Period.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59 hours on 17th August,2020.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  60. Phonebook Sync New User Experiment

    This New User Phonebook Sync” (“Promotion”) will be available to the first 10,000 users who see the in-app communication and will be prompted to choose to sync their phonebook only in case where they are not net winners (where Total Amount Won is greater than Contest Entry Amount) in their first paid contest on Dream11. Only the first 10,000 users who choose to sync their phonebook, upon successful completion of phonebook sync during the Promotion Period will receive a Discount coupon worth INR 10.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to only those users who are newly registered with the Dream11 Platform during the Promotion Period, have played their first paid contest and not won an amount greater than the Contest entry amount in the first paid contest they play. Only the first 10,000 users who receive the in-app communication from this cohort, and successfully sync their phonebook will be eligible for the reward.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours from August 18th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on August 25th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that only users who register on Dream11 for the first time after the start of the Promotion Period, who have not won any cash prize amount in their first paid contest on Dream11 that is greater than the contest entry amount (net winners) and are among the first 10,000 users to receive the in-app and sync their phonebook would be eligible for this promotion.
    • An eligible user under this Promotion can only receive the Discount Coupon worth INR 10 if he chooses to sync his phonebook for the first time. Any subsequent phonebook syncing by the user will not have any additional discount coupon or any other rewards for the user.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winners of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Discount Coupon reward will be credited into the eligible users’ Account within 48 hours of users successfully syncing their phonebook on Dream11 for the first time.
    • The Discount Coupon is applicable to all matches on Dream11 for 7 days, or until 23:59:59 hours on 28th August, 2020, whichever comes first.

  61. Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 1 (18th August – 23rd August) – 25% Discount Pass

    • This Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contest with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 23rd August, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on August 24th, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on August 24th, 2020.
    • The Discount Pass will allow the user to avail a 25% discount in any of the remaining matches of the Hero Caribbean Premier League, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
      This discount coupon is applicable only for the Hero Caribbean Premier League matches.
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-3 15,000
      4-50 4,000
      51-1000 400
      1001-12,000 100
      12,001-25,000 65
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on August 24th, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount coupon expires on September 11th, 2020.
    • Discount coupons cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, discount coupons cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Dream11 wallet.

    • This Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contest with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard updates with a match’s results 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 30th August, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on August 31st, 2020.
    • Winners will receive Discount Code to their Dream11 registered email address on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 1st, 2020. These Discount Codes can be redeemed on http://shop.fancode.com

    • Discount Codes can be used only on one transaction and will expire on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 15th 2020.

      Minimum order value of 500 INR for the discount to be applicable

      Qualifying Rank Discount Amount
      1-3 INR 500
      4-1000 INR 350
      1001-10,000 INR 250
      10,001 - 25,000 INR 100
      25,001 - 50,000 INR 50
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on August 31st, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and each user on the same rank shall receive the Discount Code as per the above table.
    • The Discount Code expires on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 15th 2020.

  68. Dream11 First Deposit Bonus Offer August 2020

    This "First Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all new users of Dream11 who have registered on the Dream11 app before and during the Promotion Period and have never made a deposit on Dream11 (“user”). Under this Promotion, users who make their first Qualifying Deposit of minimum INR 25 during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those users who receive communications of the offer from Dream11 via in app banner and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on August 26th, 2020 till IST 16:00:00 hours on August 31st , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of minimum INR 25 or above ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount which is equal to your Qualifying Deposit or Rs 100, whichever is lower.
    • Please note that only the first Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for your first Qualifying Deposit amount.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 1st ,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 100.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 3,00,000 (Three Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  69. August Flash Deposit Bonus Offer

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)

    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 19:15:00 hours on 27th August, 2020 till IST 19:30:00 hours on 27th August, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Promotion Period
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      9 18
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • The maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period is set to a total of 20 Qualifying Deposits.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR360. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit 20 qualifying deposits during the Promotion Period.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59 hours on 28th August,2020.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 2,00,000 (Two Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 2,00,000 (Two Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  71. Hero Caribbean Premier League (Cash Bonus Offer)

    This Cash Bonus Offer is open to select users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application during the Promotion Period. Under this Promotion, users who join contests amounting to a minimum of Rs.100 in every match scheduled under Hero Caribbean Premier League and participates in atleast 8 games out of 17 games during the Promotion Period shall be eligible to receive a cash bonus of upto Rs. 1000 (“Cash Bonus”) based on the total number of games in which a user participates, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 19:30:00 hours on Aug 29th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on September 11th 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, users must join contests amounting to a minimum of Rs.100 in each match scheduled under the Hero Caribbean Premier League and participate in atleast 8 out of 17 games during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus.
    • If any of the matches get abandoned, those matches won’t be considered for the promotion.
    • The Cash Bonus will be sent to the qualifying users by 23:59:59 on September 12th, 2020.
    • Each qualifying user will be credited Rs.300 in their respective cash bonus account if they play between 8 - 13 games of Hero Caribbean Premier League during the Promotion Period.
    • Users who play 14 or more games of Hero Caribbean Premier League during the Promotion Period shall receive Rs.1000 in their Cash Bonus Account.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus that can be availed by the user pursuant to this Promotion is Rs.1000.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • The Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date it’s given to the user.

  74. Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 3 (31st August – 6th September) – 50% Discount Pass

    • This Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contest with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 6th September, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 7th, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 7th, 2020.
    • The Discount Pass will allow the user to avail a 50% discount in any of the remaining matches of the Hero Caribbean Premier League, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).

      This discount coupon is applicable only for the Hero Caribbean Premier League matches.

    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-3 10,000
      4-10 5,000
      11-100 1000
      101-10,000 150
      10,001-20,000 50
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on September 7th, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount coupon expires on September 11th, 2020.
    • Discount coupons cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, discount coupons cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Dream11 wallet.

  75. Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 3 (31st August – 6th September) – Merchandise Discount Coupon

    • This Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contest with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard updates with a match’s results 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 6th September, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 7th, 2020.
    • Winners will receive Discount Code to their Dream11 registered email address on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 7th, 2020. These Discount Codes can be redeemed on http://shop.fancode.com.
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive a unique discount code worth Discount Amount as per the below table.
    • Discount Codes can be used only on one transaction and will expire on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 15th 2020.

      Minimum order value of 500 INR for the discount to be applicable

      Qualifying Rank Discount Amount
      1-3 INR 500
      4-1000 INR 350
      1001-10,000 INR 250
      10,001 - 25,000 INR 100
      25,001 - 50,000 INR 50
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on September 7th, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and each user on the same rank shall receive the Discount Code as per the above table.
    • The Discount Code expires on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 15th 2020.

    • Please note that only the first Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.

    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Promotion Period
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      10 20
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • The maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period is set to a total of 30 Qualifying Deposits.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 600. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit 30 qualifying deposits during the Promotion Period.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59 hours on 4th September,2020.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 2,00,000 (Two Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 2,00,000 (Two Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.

  81. Dream11 First Deposit Bonus Offer September 7th 2020

    This "First Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to selected users of Dream11 who have registered on the Dream11 app before and during the Promotion Period and have never made a deposit on Dream11 (“user”). Under this Promotion, users who make their first Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those users who receive communications of the offer from Dream11 via in app banner and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those users who receive communications of the offer from Dream11 via in app banner and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 21:00:00 hours on September 7th, 2020 till IST 10:00:00 hours on September 11th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Promotion Period
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      35 30
      55 75
      75 75
      100 200
    • Please note that only the first Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for your first Qualifying Deposit amount.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 12th ,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 200.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 3,00,000 (Three Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited.
