  84. Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 4 (7th September – 13th September) – Merchandise Discount Coupon

    • This Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contest with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard updates with a match’s results 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 12th September, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 13th, 2020.
    • Winners will receive Discount Code to their Dream11 registered email address on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 13th, 2020. These Discount Codes can be redeemed on http://shop.fancode.com
    • Discount Codes can be used only on one transaction and will expire on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 18th 2020.
      Minimum order value of 500 INR for the discount to be applicable
      Qualifying Rank Discount Amount
      1-3 INR 500
      4-1000 INR 350
      1001-10,000 INR 250
      10,001 - 25,000 INR 100
      25,001 - 50,000 INR 50
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on September 13th, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and each user on the same rank shall receive the Discount Code as per the above table.
    • The Discount Code expires on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 18th 2020.

  85. Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 4 (7th September – 13th September) – 25% Dream11 IPL Discount Pass

    • This Hero Caribbean Premier League Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Hero Caribbean Premier League Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contest with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 13th September, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 14th, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 14th, 2020.
    • The discount pass will allow the user to avail a 25% discount (“Discount Pass”) in any of the matches of the Dream11 IPL, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
      This Discount Pass is applicable only for the Dream11 Indian Premier League matches.
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-3 7,500
      4-10 1,000
      11-100 500
      101-5,000 150
      5,001-15,000 75
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on September 13th, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Pass and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount Pass expires on 23:59:00 on November 10th, 2020.
    • Discount Pass cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, Discount Pass cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Dream11 wallet.
    • Discount Pass is exclusive and can not be shared with any other user.

    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of minimum INR 25 or above ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount.
    • Please note that only the first Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for your first Qualifying Deposit amount.

Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 17:15:00 hours on 11th September, 2020 till IST 17:30:00 hours on 11th September, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Promotion Period
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      5 10
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • The maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period is set to a total of 50 Qualifying Deposits.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 500. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit 50 qualifying deposits during the Promotion Period.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59 hours on 12th September,2020.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 2,00,000 (Two Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 2,00,000 (Two Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 30 days from the date that it has been credited

    This "First Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to selected users of Dream11 who have registered on the Dream11 app before and during the Promotion Period and have never made a deposit on Dream11 (“user”). Under this Promotion, users who make their first Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those users who receive communications of the offer from Dream11 via in app banner and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:00:00 hours on September 15th, 2020 till IST 19:00:00 hours on September 16th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of minimum INR 25 or above upto INR 100 ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount which is equal to your Qualifying Deposit or Rs 100, whichever is lower.
    • Please note that only the first Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for your first Qualifying Deposit amount.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 17th ,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 100.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  97. Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 1 (14th September – 20th September) – 20% Dream11 IPL Discount Pass

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contest with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 20th September, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 21st, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 21st, 2020.
    • The discount pass will allow the user to avail a 20% discount (“Discount Pass”) in any of the matches of the Dream11 IPL, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below). This Discount Pass is applicable only for the Dream11 Indian Premier League matches.
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-50 5000
      51-1000 750
      1001-10000 85
      10001-30000 25
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on September 21st, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Pass and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount Pass expires on 23:59:00 on November 10th, 2020.
    • Discount Pass cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, Discount Pass cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Dream11 wallet.
    • Discount Pass is exclusive and can not be shared with any other user.

  98. Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 1 (14th September – 20th September) – Merchandise Discount Coupon

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contest with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard updates with a match’s results 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 20th September, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 21st, 2020.
    • Winners will receive Discount Code to their Dream11 registered email address on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 21st, 2020. These Discount Codes can be redeemed on http://shop.fancode.com
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive a unique discount code worth Discount Amount as per the below table.
    • Discount Codes can be used only on one transaction and will expire on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 15th 2020.
      Minimum order value of 500 INR for the discount to be applicable
      Qualifying Rank Discount Amount
      1-10000 INR 750
      10001-25000 INR 500
      25001-50000 INR 350
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on September 20th, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and each user on the same rank shall receive the Discount Code as per the above table.
    • The Discount Code expires on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 15th 2020.

  99. IPL Recap Quiz

    The “IPL Recap: Quiz” Promotion is open to all registered users of Dream11 who view the post by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be eleven (11) multiple choice quiz questions based on previous IPL trivia that will be posted by the Dream11 official page at hourly intervals on the social feed during the Promotion Period on September 17th, 2020. All participating users must answer all the 11 (eleven) quiz questions correctly to be eligible to participate in this Promotion (“Eligible Users”). Amongst the Eligible Users, one winner (“Winner”) will be selected from a random draw, to receive the Game Changer Award (a pre-recorded video from a cricketer congratulating the winner in personal email account) within 7 working days of this Promotion going live, in accordance with, and subject to the user’s compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The first question will be out at 16:00 and the last question will be out at 21:00. All quiz questions will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:00:00 hours on September 17th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on September 17th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each quiz has a predetermined end time and participation in the quiz will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each quiz question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their vote on the poll. Each of the eleven (11) quiz questions will have its own Duration. All quiz questions will be eligible for participation until IST 23:59:59 hours on September 17th, 2020.
    • Only users who select the correct answers to all eleven (11) quiz questions will be eligible to receive the Game Changer Award.
    • Only a single winner, selected at random from the pool of all Eligible Users, will receive the Game Changer Award.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the Winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • By participating in this quiz, users wilfully consent to be contacted by Dream11 to confirm their identity and personal details and get their explicit consent in receiving the Game Changer Award. Only upon receiving this consent and in accordance with the terms, Dream11 will send the pre-recorded video to the Winner via email and will announce on the Dream11 social feed the first name, full name or the team name of the winner, whichever of the three they give explicit consent to use as such.

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)

    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:00:00 hours on 18th September, 2020 till IST 23:59:00 hours on 18th September, 2020 (“Promotion Period”).

      Dream11 IPL Pass Bonus Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Conditions
      Rs.999, 10% discount 999 10% discount worth Rs. 999 on all Rs. 50+ contests in 60 matches of Dream11 IPL. Max discount of Rs 100 per match
      Rs.949, 20% discount on head2head 949 20% discount worth Rs. 949 on all Rs. 50+ Head to Head contests contests in 60 matches of Dream11 IPL
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Dream11 IPL Pass and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Dream11 IPL Pass shall be shared only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values
    • Users who receive a Dream11 IPL Pass must use the Dream11 IPL Pass in accordance with the corresponding Conditions mentioned in the above table.
    • Dream11 IPL Pass cannot be used for any private contests running on the platform.
    • Dream11 IPL Pass shall expire on Nov 10th i.e. on the Dream11 IPL Final match day..
    • Please note that every unique qualifying deposit corresponding to a Dream11 IPL Pass will make you eligible for that pass only.
    • The Dream11 IPL Pass shall be shared with a user by 19:00:00 on 19th Sep, 2020.
    • This Promotion is valid for only first Five Lakh Avails who make the Qualifying Deposit during the promotion period.

  103. Dream11 Paid Private Contest Creator Promotion

    This "Paid Private Contest Creator Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who are above loyalty level 200 and are PAN and Bank Account Verified. ("User") Under this Promotion, Users who organise paid private contests of minimum fifty (50) participants to a maximum of five hundred (500) participants, shall be eligible to receive Cash Bonus equivalent to two percent (2%) of the total prize pool of the contest ("Cash Bonus").

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those users who are above loyalty level 200 and whose account is verified with PAN and bank details.
    • The User shall not have any history of fair play violation, fraudulent transactions, misconduct complaints received on the Dream11 platform.
    • User must at all times comply with Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 10:00:00 hours on September 18th , 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on 18th October , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Users who participate in the promotion and fulfil all the criteria shall receive 2% of the total prize pool in their Cash Bonus Account on a fortnightly basis for the number of paid private contests created in the preceding week. The Contest Creator Bonus will be paid from the platform fees generated by Dream11, and will not affect the winning amounts that contest participants earn.
    • In the event of any match getting cancelled and/or abandoned, the contest shall be cancelled, and all amounts paid for such contest shall be refunded.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to block any user from organising paid private contest and withhold the Cash Bonus, if it is found that paid private contests are created fraudulently.

  104. Dream11 IPL Deposit Bonus Offer Terms and Conditions

    This "Dream11 IPL Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on Sep 19th, 2020 till IST 17:00:00 hours on Sep 19th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      7,777 3,333
      5,555 2,222
      777 333
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on Sep 20th,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 5,888. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit once.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  105. The “Game Changer Activation Award”

    The “Game Changer Activation Award” Promotion is open to all registered users of Dream11 from 19th September 2020 until 8th November 2020. This Game Changer Award will be given to the first rank Winner of the largest Dream11 Mega Contest (in terms of total contest prize pool amount). The reward is a personalized pre recorded video from a star cricketer congratulating the winner sent to the user’s personal email account (“ Game Changer Award”). The user is free to share this video on their social media profiles at their own discretion. This is in accordance with, and subject to the user’s compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be availed through playing in the Dream11 Mega Contest on the Dream11 application. The first rank winner of the Dream11 Mega Contest with the largest prize pool amount (“Winner”) will be selected as the recipient of the Game Changer Award for each of the Dream11 IPL matches, subject to receiving an explicit consent from the Winner.
    • Within 12 hours of the winner declaration process for each IPL match being completed, Dream11 will contact the Dream11 Mega Contest Winner for the match in question via telephone and email to seek explicit consent from the Winner on receiving the Game Changer Award.
    • The Game Changer Award will be awarded to the user with the highest rank in the Dream11 Mega Contest for each Dream11 IPL match starting from September 19th 2020 until November 8th 2020, given that Dream11 receives explicit consent from the Winner(s) to receive Game Changer Award.
    • Consent will be received from the Winner through the Dream11 team contacting them directly via telephone and sending a congratulatory email. The Winner will have 3 hours after the telephone call to reply to the congratulatory email from Dream11 after which point, they would no longer be eligible to receive the Game Changer Award.
    • In the case where the user does not accept the award within 3 hours of the telephone call, another user will be selected in place of such user to receive the Game Changer Award instead. In this case, the process for selecting the recipient of the Game Changer Award is as follows. The first rank holder of the Dream11 Mega Contest with the highest prize pool will be considered first. If the first rank holder does not wish to receive the reward or does not provide full consent within 3 hours of being contacted via telephone, then the second rank holder of that same Dream11 Mega Contest will be contacted by the Dream11 team. If the second rank holder also does not wish to receive the reward and does not provide the necessary consent in accordance with the given time frame, the third rank holder of the same Dream11 Mega Contest will be contacted. If all users in the first 3 ranks of the Dream11 Mega Contest do not wish to be contacted or do not provide consent in time, the first 3 ranks of the second largest Dream11 Mega Contest (in terms of prize pool amount) will be contacted next, starting from the first rank onwards. This process will continue for the first 3 ranks of each Dream11 Mega Contest, starting with the largest prize pool until the final recipient of the Game Changer Award is selected.
    • If there is a tie for first place and there are two Winners of the Dream11 Mega Contest, Dream11 reserves the right to use its discretion in selecting the final Winner who will receive the Game Changer Award.
    • In case of a match getting abandoned, the Game Changer Award will not be awarded for that match to any Dream11 user.
    • In case of two Dream11 Mega Contests both with the same prize pool (both of which are the largest contest prize pool amount), Dream11 reserves the right to select the Game Changer Award at their sole discretion.
    • Only a single user will receive the Game Changer Award for each Dream11 IPL match.
    • By playing any Dream11 Mega Contest, users wilfully consent to be contacted by Dream11 to confirm their identity and personal details and get their explicit consent in receiving the Game Changer Award.
    • The Game Changer Award video will be sent to the Winner on his personal email within 7 working days of their explicit consent being received to do so.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the Winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to cancel, abandon this Promotion at any time without prior notice to the users and Dream11’s decision to do so will be in its sole and absolute discretion.

  106. Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 2 (21st September – 27th September) – Merchandise Discount Coupon

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL Dream11 contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contest with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard updates with a match’s results 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 27th September, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 28th, 2020.
    • Winners will receive Discount Code to their Dream11 registered email address on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 28th, 2020. These Discount Codes can be redeemed on http://shop.fancode.com
    • Winner with the qualifying rank will receive a unique discount code worth Discount Amount as per the below table.
    • Discount Codes can be used only on one transaction and will expire on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 15th 2020
      Minimum order value of 500 INR for the discount to be applicable
      Qualifying Rank Discount Amount
      1-10000 INR 750
      10001-25000 INR 500
      25001-50000 INR 350
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on September 27th, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and each user on the same rank shall receive the Discount Code as per the above table.
    • The Discount Code expires on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 15th 2020.

  107. Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 2 (21st September – 27th September) – 20% Dream11 IPL Discount Pass

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contests with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contests during the week and up till the match on 27th September 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on September 28th, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on September 28th, 2020.
    • The discount pass will allow the user to avail a 20% discount (“Discount Pass”) in any of the matches of the Dream11 IPL, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below). This Discount Pass is applicable only for the Dream11 Indian Premier League matches.
    • Winner with the Qualifying Rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-10 5000
      11-1000 1000
      1001-20000 100
      20001-50000 30
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on September 27th, 2020 shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Pass and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount Pass expires on 23:59:00 on November 10th, 2020.
    • Discount Pass cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, Discount Pass cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Dream11 wallet.
    • Discount Pass is exclusive and can not be shared with any other user.

  108. Dream11 Paid Private Contest Creator Promotion

    This "Paid Private Contest Creator Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who are above loyalty level 150 and are PAN and Bank Account Verified. ("User") Under this Promotion, Users who organise paid private contests of minimum twenty five (25) participants to a maximum of one thousand (1000) participants, shall be eligible to receive Cash Bonus equivalent to two percent (2%) of the total prize pool of the contest ("Cash Bonus").

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those users who are above loyalty level 150 and whose account is verified with PAN and bank details.
    • The User shall not have any history of fair play violation, fraudulent transactions, misconduct complaints received on the Dream11 platform.
    • User must at all times comply with Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on September 21st , 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on 21st October , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Users who participate in the promotion and fulfil all the criteria shall receive 2% of the total prize pool in their Cash Bonus Account on a fortnightly basis for the number of paid private contests created in the preceding week. The Contest Creator Bonus will be paid from the platform fees generated by Dream11, and will not affect the winning amounts that contest participants earn.
    • In the event of any match getting cancelled and/or abandoned, the contest shall be cancelled, and all amounts paid for such contest shall be refunded.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to block any user from organising paid private contests and withhold the Cash Bonus, if it is found that paid private contests are created fraudulently.

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contests with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contests during the week and up till the match on 4th October 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 5th, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 5th, 2020.
    • The discount pass will allow the user to avail a 40% discount (“Discount Pass”) in any of the matches of the Dream11 IPL, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below). This Discount Pass is applicable only for the Dream11 Indian Premier League matches.
    • Winner with the Qualifying Rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-10 5000
      11-1000 1000
      1001-20000 100
      20001-50000 30
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on October 4th, 2020 shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Pass and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount Pass expires on 23:59:00 on November 10th, 2020.
    • Discount Pass cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, Discount Pass cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Cash Bonus account.

  110. Hat-Trick Contest: Promotion

    This "Hat-Trick Contest: Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 3 multiple choice questions based on the upcoming IPL match of the day posted by the Dream11 official page between 14:00:00 IST to 19:30:00 IST on September 29th, 2020. The first 10,000 (ten thousand) users to answer all 3 questions correctly will receive a Cash Bonus worth INR 25.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on September 29th, 2020 till IST 19:30:00 hours on September 29th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 10,000 users who select the correct answers to all three (3) multiple choice questions will be eligible to receive the Cash Bonus reward.
    • A user can only receive the Cash Bonus amount of INR 25 once.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Cash Bonus will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 1st, 2020.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)

      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      100 50

  113. Dream11 First Deposit Bonus Offer for October 1st

    This "First Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to selected new users of Dream11 who have never registered on the Dream11 platform before. A user needs to register during the Promotion Period and shall have never made a deposit on Dream11 platform (“New User”) to be eligible for this Promotion. Under this Promotion, New Users who make their first Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those New Users who receive communications of the offer from Dream11 via in-app banner and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 15:00:00 hours on October 1st, 2020 till IST 13:00:00 hours on October 8th 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, a New User must make at least one cash deposit of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into the Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by the New User, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      35 35
      75 50
      100 100
      500 250
      1,000 1,000
    • Please note that only the first Qualifying Deposit made by a New User during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the New User into such New User’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by New User during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for a New User’s first Qualifying Deposit amount.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 9th,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 1000.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) New Users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  114. Dream11 First Deposit Bonus Offer October 2020

    This "First Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to select new users of Dream11 who have registered on the Dream11 app before and during the Promotion Period and have never made a deposit on Dream11 (“user”). Under this Promotion, users who make their first Qualifying Deposit of minimum INR 25 during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Notwithstanding anything herein, participation in the Promotion is only available to those users who receive communications of the offer from Dream11 via in app banner and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 19:30:00 hours on October 10th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on November 11th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of minimum INR 25 or above ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount which is twice your Qualifying Deposit or Rs 200, whichever is lower.
    • Please note that only the first Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for your first Qualifying Deposit amount.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on November 13th, 2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 200.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (Three Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  115. First Deposit Cash Bonus via Promo code Offer October 2020

    This “First Deposit Cash Bonus via Promo code Offer October 2020” (“Promotion“), is open for participation to all existing users of Dream11 app (“Platform”) who see the banner via in app communication. Under this Promotion users will receive a unique code (“Promotion Code”) via marketing communications during the Promotion Period. Each user who makes their first Qualifying Deposit of minimum INR 25 during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be required to enter the Promotion Code where prompted on the Dream 11 platform to be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), , in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to users of Dream11 (i) registered on the Platform and whose account has been verified by Dream11; (ii) who are eligible to participate in the pay-to play Dream11 fantasy games (as per Dream11’s terms and condition (accessible here); and (iii) who has a valid Promotion Code.
    • By participating in the Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 1200 hours on 1st October, 2020 till IST 2300 hours on 11th November, 2020 (“Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must enter the Promotion Code, where prompted on the Dream11 Platform and thereafter you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly INR 25 or above ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you.
    • Upon successful deposit of minimum INR 25 or above during the Promotion Period, user shall be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount which is two times your Qualifying Deposit or Rs 200, whichever is lower.
    • Please note that only a valid Promotion Code followed with a Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • The maximum limit on the number of times a Promotion Code can be used is limited to One (1).
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 200.
    • This Promotion cannot be clubbed with any other offers or promotions that are running on the Dream11 platform.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to change/modify/or withdraw the Promotion and/or change these terms and conditions without any prior notice of the same at its sole discretion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 2300 hours on 13th November, 2020.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first One Lakh (1 Lakh) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first One Lakh (1 Lakh) users shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  116. Dream Sports Merchandise Discount Coupon Offer Terms and Conditions

    This "Dream Sports Merchandise Discount Coupon Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a Discount Coupon ("Discount Coupon"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 21:00:00 hours on Oct 1st, 2020 till IST 21:15:00 hours on Oct 1st , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Eligible users will receive the Discount Coupon to their Dream11 registered email address on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 2nd, 2020. These Discount Codes can be redeemed only on Dream Sports Collection on https://shop.fancode.com/collections/dep-oct (“Platform”).
    • The eligible users will receive a unique discount code (“Discount Code”) worth a discount amount (“Discount Amount”) as per the below table.
    • The Discount Code can only be used on a minimum order value of INR 500/- (Indian Rupees Five Hundred Only). Discount Code can be used only on one transaction and will expire on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 15th 2020. Any remaining Discount Amount after availing the Discount Code on one transaction on the Platform shall lapse.
      To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly the amount specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Discount Coupon corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Discount Amount (INR)
      2,222 1,111
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any other deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Discount Coupon shall be credited only once for your first Qualifying Deposit amount as mentioned in the table above.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 5,000 (Five Thousand) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 5,000 (Five Thousand) eligible users shall be calculated on a first cum first serve basis in accordance with who makes the deposit first.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)

      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      5,555 2,222
      1,111 444
      555 222
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on Oct 3rd,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 2,888. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit once.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  118. Who Am I Contest: Promotion

    This "Who am I Quiz: Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 3 multiple choice questions based on the previous Dream11 IPL 2020 matches posted by the Dream11 official page between 16:00:00 IST to 22:00:00 IST on October 2nd, 2020. The first 10,000 (ten thousand) users to answer all 3 questions correctly will receive a Cash Bonus worth INR 25.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:00:00 hours on October 2nd, 2020 till IST 22:00:00 hours on October 2nd, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 10,000 users who select the correct answers to all three (3) multiple choice questions will be eligible to receive the Cash Bonus reward.
    • A user can only receive the Cash Bonus amount of INR 25 once.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Cash Bonus will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 4th, 2020.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  119. Refer Two Friends Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This Refer Two Friends offer is open to all existing users of Dream11. Under this Promotion, users who invite (“Inviter”) their friends (“Invitee”) to join the Dream11 platform and two Invitees register on Dream11 and join a paid public contest during the Promotion Period, the Inviter shall be eligible to receive IPL Discount Coupon worth Rs. 200 (“Inviter Discount Coupon”). The Inviter Discount Coupon will be awarded to the Inviter within 12 hours of qualifying for the offer and in accordance with and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who receive the communication from Dream11 via in-app banner and invite at least two (2) of their friends to join Dream11 during the Promotion Period and join a paid public contest during the Promotion Period.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 20:00:00 hours on October 2nd, 2020 till IST 19:59:59 hours on October 9th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • The Inviter shall be eligible to receive the Discount Coupons for the first two (2) invitees who register and join a paid public contest during the promotion period.
    • The Inviter shall receive their Inviter Discount Coupon within Twelve (12) hours from the time of first paid public contest joined by their second Invitee. The 25% discount can be applied on any contests of the Indian Premier League matches only and the maximum discount value is Rs.200.
    • Discount Coupon expires on 10th November 2020.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to cancel this promotion at any time in its sole discretion without any notice.

  120. Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 4 (5th October – 11th October) – 40% Dream11 IPL Discount Pass

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contests with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contests during the week and up till the match on 11th October 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 12th, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 12th, 2020.
    • The discount pass will allow the user to avail a 40% discount (“Discount Pass”) in any of the matches of the Dream11 IPL, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
      This Discount Pass is applicable only for the Dream11 Indian Premier League matches.
    • Winner with the Qualifying Rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-10 5000
      11-1000 1000
      1001-20000 100
      20001-50000 30
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on October 11th, 2020 shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Pass and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount Pass expires on 23:59:00 on November 10th, 2020.
    • Discount Pass cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, Discount Pass cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Cash Bonus account.
    • Discount Pass is exclusive and can not be shared with any other user.

  121. Guess The Opponent Quiz

    This "Guess The Opponent Quiz" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 3 multiple choice questions based on the previous Dream11 IPL matches posted by the Dream11 official page between 14:00:00 IST to 22:00:00 IST on October 6th, 2020. If there are more than 10,000 winners, only the first 10,000 users to answer all 3 questions correctly will receive the INR 25 CB amount.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on October 6th, 2020 till IST 22:00:00 hours on October 6th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 10,000 users who select the correct answers to all three (3) multiple choice questions will be eligible to receive the Cash Bonus reward. If the winners are less than 10,000 in number, all winners split the prize pool of 2,50,000 equally. If there are more than 10,000 winners, only the first 10,000 users to answer all 3 questions correctly will receive the INR 25 CB amount.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Cash Bonus will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 8th, 2020.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:00:00 hours on Oct 10th, 2020 till IST 23:59:00 hours on Oct 10th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly of the amount specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 Deposit Aaccount during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Discount Amount (INR)
      1111 500
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 Deposit Aaccount before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on Oct 11th, 2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 500.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 20,000 (Twenty Thousand) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 20,000 (Twenty Thousand) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  128. October Deposit Bonus Offer Terms and Conditions

  130. Hat trick Quiz: Promotion

    This "Hat Trick Quiz" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 3 multiple choice questions based on the previous Dream11 IPL matches posted by the Dream11 official page between 16:00:00 IST to 22:00:00 IST on October 10th, 2020. Up to 10,000 users can receive the INR 25 Cash Bonus reward for this quiz, given that they correctly answer all the 3 questions posted. If there are more than 10,000 winners, only the first 10,000 users to answer all 3 questions correctly will receive the INR 25 CB amount. If there are less than 10,000 winners, all winners will share the prize pool amount of INR 2,50,000 in Cash Bonus equally.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:00:00 hours on October 10th, 2020 till IST 22:00:00 hours on October 10th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 10,000 users who select the correct answers to all three (3) multiple choice questions will be eligible to receive the Cash Bonus reward.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Cash Bonus will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 12th, 2020.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  131. Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 5 (12th October – 18th October) – 50% Dream11 IPL Discount Pass

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contests with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contests during the week and up till the match on 18th October 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 19th, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 19th, 2020.
    • The discount pass will allow the user to avail a 50% discount (“Discount Pass”) in any of the matches of the Dream11 IPL, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
      This Discount Pass is applicable only for the Dream11 Indian Premier League matches.
    • Winner with the Qualifying Rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-20 6000
      21-1000 1000
      1001-20000 150
      20001-50000 100
      50001-75000 50
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on October 18th, 2020 shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Pass and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount Pass expires on 23:59:00 on November 10th, 2020.
    • Discount Pass cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, Discount Pass cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Cash Bonus account.
    • Discount Pass is exclusive and can not be shared with any other user.

  132. Refer Friends Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This Refer Friends offer is open to all existing users of Dream11 who receive communication from Dream11 via feed banner in the Dream11 mobile application only. Under this Promotion, users who receive the communication and invite (“Inviter”) their friends (“Invitee”) to join the Dream11 platform and Invitees register on Dream11 and join a paid contest during the Promotion Period ( defined below), the Inviter shall be eligible to receive IPL Discount Coupon worth Rs. 100 (“Inviter Discount Coupon”). The Inviter Discount Coupon will be awarded to the Inviter within 12 hours of qualifying for the offer and in accordance with and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who invite their friends to join Dream11 during the Promotion Period and join a paid contest during the Promotion Period.
    • The Invitee must register and join paid contest only.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here).
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 20:00:00 hours on October 14th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on October 21st, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • The Inviter shall be eligible to receive the Discount Coupons for the first invitee who register and join a paid contest during the promotion period only.
    • The Inviter shall receive their Inviter Discount Coupon within Twelve (12) hours from the time of first paid contest joined by their second Invitee. The 50% discount can be applied on any contests of the Indian Premier League matches only and the maximum discount value is Rs.200.
    • Discount Coupon expires on 10th November 2020.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to cancel this promotion at any time in its sole discretion without any notice.

  133. Refer Friends Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This Refer Friends offer is open to all existing users of Dream11 who receive communication from Dream11 via feed banner in the Dream11 mobile application only.     Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who invite their friends to join Dream11 during the Promotion Period and join a paid contest during the Promotion Period.
    • The Invitee must register and join paid contest only.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here).
