    • The Inviter shall be eligible to receive the Discount Coupons for the first three invitees who register and join a paid contest during the promotion period only as per the below table.
      On 1st (referral + join paid contest) IPL Pass 50% discount Total discount worth Rs.50
      On 2nd (referral + join paid contest) IPL Pass 50% discount Total discount worth Rs.150
      On 3rd (referral + join paid contest) IPL Pass 50% discount Total discount worth Rs.300
    • The Inviter shall receive their Inviter Discount Coupon within Twelve (12) hours from the time of first paid contest joined. The 50% discount can be applied on any contests of the Indian Premier League matches only and the maximum discount value that can be availed by the users is Rs.500.

  136. Beat the Champion: Promotion

    This "Beat the Champion Promotion" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who join a private contest shared by the Dream11 Champion (Peeyush Sharma, teamname: PhantastiPeeyush11) in their respective Dream11 broadcast group. This private contest will be free of entry to all users and only up to 1000 members can join such a contest created by the Dream11 Champion. Each user wishing to participate in such a contest will be allowed to enter with only one team (single entry only). All users with a rank higher than that of the Dream11 Champion in this free private contest would be eligible to receive a 50% discount coupon worth up to INR 50 each (“Discount Coupon”), applicable across all sports on the Dream11 app. Any user with rank lower than the Dream11 Champion would not receive any Discount Coupon rewards.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through joining a contest shared by the Dream11 Champion on his Dream11 broadcast group.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:00:00 hours on October 17th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on October 17th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Users can join the contest with one team only (single entry). Entry with multiple teams will not be permitted for this contest.
    • The contest will be open for joining until roundlock for the 7:30PM IST match, unless it already has 1000 members in which case no one else would be able to join this contest, since it has 1000 spots only.
    • There can be at most 1000 participants in this contest, and 999 total winners of this Beat the Champion promotion (in the case that the Dream11 Championholds the last rank of the contest, all 999 ranks above him would receive the Discount Coupon).
    • In the case of a tie between another user and the Dream11 Champion, the other user would not be eligible to receive the Discount Coupon. Only ranks that are higher than the Champion’s rank are eligible to receive the Discount Coupon.
    • This promotion is only applicable to a single free private contest shared by the Dream11 Champion, on his broadcast group on October 17th, 2020. The contest in question would be a free private contest of up to 1000 members for the Delhi Capitals vs. Chennai Super Kings 7:30 PM IST evening match on October 17th, 2020. This contest will be created by the Dream11 Champion from their Dream11 broadcast group. No further private contests shared by Dream11 Champion would be considered for this Promotion.
    • All users who rank higher than the Dream11 Champion in the free contest created under this Promotion shall be eligible to receive a 50% discount coupon worth up to INR 50.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Discount Coupon will be credited into eligible user’s Dream11 Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 20th, 2020.
    • The Discount Coupon will be available for contests across all sports, and will expire 7 days from when it is credited to the user’s Dream11 Account, by 23:59:59 hours on October 20th, 2020.
    • Discount Coupon is exclusive and can not be shared with any other user.
    • The Discount Coupon cannot be clubbed alongside any other rewards or offers.

    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on Oct 17th, 2020 till IST 23:59:00 hours on Oct 17th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly of the amount specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 Deposit Account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      2222 2222
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 Deposit Account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on Oct 18th, 2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 2222.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 20,000 (Twenty Thousand) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 20,000 (Twenty Thousand) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  145. Hat Trick Quiz: Promotion

    This "Hat Trick Quiz" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 3 multiple choice questions based on Dream11 IPL matches and players of Dream11 IPL from the current season, posted by the Dream11 official page between 16:00:00 IST to 21:59:59 IST on October 17th, 2020. The Cash bonus prize pool for this promotion is 2,50,000. If the winners are more than 10,000, only the first 10,000 will win INR 25 Cash Bonus each. If the winners are less than 10,000, all winners will split the pool money of 2,50,000 equally, given that they have answered all the 3 questions posted. If there are exactly 10,000 winners, all will receive the Cash Bonus reward of INR 25 each.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:00:00 hours on October 17th, 2020 till IST 21:59:59 hours on October 17th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 10,000 users who select the correct answers to all three (3) multiple choice questions will be eligible to win cash bonuses worth 2,50,000 in total.In the case where there are less than 10,000 winners, the total prize pool of INR 2,50,000 will be split equally amongst all winners. If there are more than 10,000 winners, then only the first 10,000 users to correctly answer all 3 quiz questions will receive the INR 25 Cash Bonus reward.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Cash bonus will be credited by 23:59:59 IST on October 19th, 2020.
    • Cash bonus must be utilised within 14 days from the date of credit

  146. Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 6 (19th October – 25th October) – 50% Dream11 IPL Discount Pass

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contests with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contests during the week and up till the match on 25th October 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on October 26th, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on October 26th, 2020.
    • The discount pass will allow the user to avail a 50% discount (“Discount Pass”) in any of the matches of the Dream11 IPL, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
      This Discount Pass is applicable only for the Dream11 Indian Premier League matches.
    • Winner with the Qualifying Rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-20 6000
      21-1000 1000
      1001-20000 150
      20001-50000 100
      50001-75000 50
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on October 25th, 2020 shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Pass and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount Pass expires on 23:59:00 on November 10th, 2020.
    • Discount Pass cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, Discount Pass cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Cash Bonus account.
    • Discount Pass is exclusive and can not be shared with any other user.

    • The eligible users will receive a unique discount code (“Discount Code”) worth a discount amount (“Discount Amount”) as per the below table.

Any remaining Discount Amount after availing the Discount Code on one transaction on the Platform shall lapse.
      To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly the amount specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Discount Coupon corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Discount Amount (INR)
      2,399 1,199
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any other deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Discount Coupon shall be credited only once for your first Qualifying Deposit amount as mentioned in the table above.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 5,000 (Five Thousand) users who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 5,000 (Five Thousand) eligible users shall be calculated on a first cum first serve basis in accordance with who makes the deposit first.
    • The terms and conditions of the FanCode shop website if any, shall be applicable at the time of redemption of the Discount Coupon.

      Rebel WBBL Qualifying Deposit (INR) Conditions
      Rs.299, 10% discount 299 10% discount worth Rs. 299 on all Rs. 50+ contests in 59 matches of Rebel WBBL. Max discount of Rs 50 per round.
      Rs.599, 20% discount 599 20% discount worth Rs. 599 on all Rs. 50+ contests in 59 matches of Rebel WBBL. Max discount of Rs 50 per round.
      Rs.999, 30% discount 999 30% discount worth Rs. 999 on all Rs. 50+ contests in 59 matches of Rebel WBBL. Max discount of Rs 50 per round.
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Rebel WBBL Pass and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Rebel WBBL Pass shall be shared only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values
    • Users who receive a Rebel WBBL Pass must use the Rebel WBBL Pass in accordance with the corresponding Conditions mentioned in the above table.
    • Rebel WBBL Pass cannot be used for any private contests running on the platform.
    • Rebel WBBL Pass shall expire on Nov 29th i.e. on the Rebel WBBL Final match day.
    • Please note that every unique qualifying deposit corresponding to a Rebel WBBL Pass will make you eligible for that pass only.
    • The Rebel WBBL Pass shall be shared with a user by 22:00:00 on 24th October, 2020.
    • This Promotion is valid for only for the first Five Lakh Avails who make the Qualifying Deposit during the Promotion Period.

  151. Dussehra Deposit Bonus Offer Terms and Conditions

    This "Dussehra Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in-app communication. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 11:00:00 hours on October 25th, 2020 till IST 19:00:00 hours on October 25th , 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Discount Amount (INR)
      100 50
      500 250
      1000 500
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on Oct 26th,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 800. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit once.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 2,00,000 (Two Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 2,00,000 (Two Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  152. Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 7 (26th October – 1st November) – 50% Rebel WBBL Discount Pass

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contests with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contests during the week and up till the match on 1st November 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on November 2nd, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on November 2nd, 2020.
    • The discount pass will allow the user to avail a 50% discount (“Discount Pass”) in any of the matches of the Rebel WBBL, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
      This Discount Pass is applicable only for the Rebel WBBL matches.
    • Winner with the Qualifying Rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-10 5000
      11-1000 750
      1001-20000 150
      20001-40000 75
      40001-60000 25
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on November 1st, 2020 shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Pass and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount Pass expires on 23:59:00 on November 29th, 2020.
    • Discount Pass cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, Discount Pass cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Cash Bonus account.
    • Discount Pass is exclusive and can not be shared with any other user.

  153. Guess the opponent Quiz: Promotion

    This "Guess The Opponent" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 3 multiple choice questions based on Dream11 IPL matches and players of Dream11 IPL from the current season, posted by the Dream11 official page between 16:00:00 IST to 21:59:59 IST on October 25th, 2020. The Cash bonus prize pool for this promotion is 5,00,000. If the winners are more than 20,000, only the first 20,000 will win INR 25 Cash Bonus each. If the winners are less than 20,000, all winners will split the pool money of 5,00,000 equally, given that they have answered all the 3 questions posted correctly. If there are exactly 20,000 winners, all will receive the Cash Bonus reward of INR 25 each.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:00:00 hours on October 25th, 2020 till IST 21:59:59 hours on October 25th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 20,000 users who select the correct answers to all three (3) multiple choice questions will be eligible to win cash bonuses worth 5,00,000 in total.In the case where there are less than 20,000 winners, the total prize pool of INR 5,00,000 will be split equally amongst all winners. If there are more than 20,000 winners, then only the first 20,000 users to correctly answer all 3 quiz questions will receive the INR 25 Cash Bonus reward. If there are exactly 20,000 winners, all will receive the Cash Bonus reward of INR 25 each.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Cash bonus will be credited by 23:59:59 IST on October 27th, 2020.
    • Cash bonus must be utilised within 14 days from the date of credit

If the winners are less than 10,000, all winners will split the pool money of 2,50,000 equally, given that they have answered all the 3 questions posted. If there are exactly 10,000 winners, all will receive the Cash Bonus reward of INR 25 each.

    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard updates with a match’s results 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contest during the week and up till the match on 8th November, 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on November 9th, 2020.
    • Winners will receive Discount Code to their Dream11 registered email address on IST 23:59:59 hours on November 9th, 2020. These Discount Codes can be redeemed on http://shop.fancode.com/collections/best-sellers

    • Discount Codes can be used only on one transaction and will expire on IST 23:59:59 hours on November 30th 2020.
    • Qualifying Rank Discount Amount Min Order
      1-30000 INR 1000 INR 1500
      30001-60000 INR 500 INR 1250
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on November 8th, 2020 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Coupon and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and each user on the same rank shall receive the Discount Code as per the above table.
    • The Discount Code expires on IST 23:59:59 hours on November 30th 2020.

  158. Invitation Premier League Challenge Terms and Conditions

    This Invitation Premier League is open to all existing users of Dream11 who receive communication from Dream11 via feed banner in the Dream11 mobile application only. Under this challenge, users who receive the communication and invite (“Inviter”) their friends(“Invitee”) to join the Dream11 platform and Invitees register on Dream11 and join a paid public contest during the Challenge Week (defined below), the Inviter shall be eligible to receive Cash Bonus as per the table mentioned below. Inviter shall receive one (1) point for each paid public contest joined by their invitee during the challenge week. The Cash Bonus will be awarded to the Inviter within 48 hours of winner declaration of the Challenge and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Challenge is only available to registered users of Dream11 who invite their friends to join Dream11 during the Challenge Week and join a paid public contest during the Challenge Week.
    • The Invitee must register and join paid public contest only.
    • By participating in this Challenge, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here).
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time (IST) 00:00:00 hours on November 3rd, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on November 10th , 2020 (Challenge Week).
    • The Inviter shall get the points at the end of the match in which the invitee joins and not at the time of contest join.
    • Points for the Leader Board shall not be awarded to the Inviter if a particular match is cancelled or abandoned.
    • Top 1000 winners on the points challenge shall be awarded Cash Bonus depending on the rank secured by the Inviter.
      Ranking system for the Invitation Premier League
      Qualifying Rank Cash Bonus Amount
      1 - 5 1000
      6 - 10 500
      11 - 100 250
      101 - 1000 100
    • The Inviter shall receive the Cash Bonus within Forty-Eight (48) hours of completion of the Challenge Week.
    • Points for contest join will be awarded to the Inviter only.
    • If there are more than 1 users on the same rank, the Cash Bonus Amount will be divided equally among the same rank holders.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to cancel this promotion at any time in its sole discretion without any notice.

  159. Dream11 (Cash Bonus Offer)

    This Cash Bonus Offer is open to select users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, users who join contests amounting to a minimum of Rs.75 in every match and participate in at least 10 matches during the Promotion Period shall be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on November 4th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on November 8th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, users must join contests amounting to a minimum of Rs. 75 in each match and participate in at least 10 matches during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus.
    • If any of the matches get abandoned, those matches won’t be considered for the Promotion.
    • The Cash Bonus will be sent to the qualifying users by 23:59:59 on November 9th.
    • Each qualifying user will be credited Rs.500 in their respective cash bonus account if they play between 10 - 14 matches during the Promotion Period.
    • Each qualifying user will be credited Rs.1000 in their respective cash bonus account if they play between 15 - 19 matches during the Promotion Period.
    • Users who play 20 or more matches will be credited Rs. 2000 in their respective cash bonus account.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus that can be availed by the user pursuant to this Promotion is Rs.2000.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • The Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date it’s given to the user.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on November 5th, 2020 till IST 22:00:00 hours on November 5th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly of the amount specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 Deposit Account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      2000 1000
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 Deposit Account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on November 6th, 2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 1000.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 20,000 (Twenty Thousand) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 20,000 (Twenty Thousand) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  165. Play Off Quiz:

    This "Play Off Quiz" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 5 multiple choice questions based on Dream11 IPL matches and players of Dream11 IPL from the current season, posted by the Dream11 official page between 12:00:00 IST to 21:59:59 IST on November 6th, 2020.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on November 6th, 2020 till IST 21:59:59 hours on November 6th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 40,000 users who select the correct answers to all five (5) multiple choice questions will be eligible to win cash bonuses worth 10,00,000 in total.In the case where there are less than 40,000 winners, the total prize pool of INR 10,00,000 will be split equally amongst all winners. If there are more than 40,000 winners, then only the first 40,000 users to correctly answer all 5 quiz questions will receive the INR 25 Cash Bonus reward. If there are exactly 40,000 winners, all will receive the Cash Bonus reward of INR 25 each.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Cash bonus will be credited by 23:59:59 IST on November 7th, 2020.
    • Unutilised Cash bonus expires within 14 days from the date of credit

  167. Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 9 (9th November – 10th November) – 50% Rebel WBBL Discount Pass

    • This Dream11 IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid Dream11 IPL contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid Dream11 IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contests with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contests during the week and up till the match on 10th November 2020 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on November 11th, 2020.
    • Winners will be awarded a Discount Pass on IST 23:59:59 hours on November 11th, 2020.
    • The discount pass will allow the user to avail a 50% discount (“Discount Pass”) in any of the matches of the Rebel WBBL, with an Overall Maximum Avail Amount limit (as defined below).
      This Discount Pass is applicable only for the Rebel WBBL matches.
    • Winner with the Qualifying Rank will receive Overall Max Avail Amount as per the below table.
      Qualifying Rank Overall Max Avail Amount (INR)
      1-50 5000
      51-1000 750
      1001-10000 85
      20001-30000 25
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on November 10th, 2020 shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Discount Pass and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and the Overall Max Avail Amount will be equally divided amongst the same rank holders.
    • The Discount Pass expires on 23:59:00 on November 29th, 2020.
    • Discount Pass cannot be clubbed together with any other promotions that are running simultaneously on the Dream11 platform. Also, Discount Pass cannot be clubbed with Cash Bonus available in his Cash Bonus account.
    • Discount Pass is exclusive and can not be shared with any other user.

  170. Dream11 (Cash Bonus Offer) 13th November, 2020

    This Cash Bonus Offer is open to select users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, users who join contests amounting to a minimum of Rs.75 in every match and participate in at least 5 matches during the Promotion Period shall be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on November 13th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on November 19th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, users must join contests amounting to a minimum of Rs. 75 in each match and participate in at least 5 matches during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive a Cash Bonus.
    • If any of the matches get abandoned, those matches won’t be considered for the Promotion.
    • The Cash Bonus will be sent to the qualifying users by 23:59:59 on November 20th.
    • Each qualifying user will be credited Rs.100 in their respective cash bonus account if they play between 5 - 6 matches during the Promotion Period.
    • Each qualifying user will be credited Rs.300 in their respective cash bonus account if they play between 7 - 9 matches during the Promotion Period.
    • Each qualifying user will be credited Rs.700 in their respective cash bonus account if they play between 10 - 14 matches during the Promotion Period.
    • Users who play 15 or more matches will be credited Rs. 1500 in their respective cash bonus account.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus that can be availed by the user pursuant to this Promotion is Rs.1500.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
    • The Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date it’s given to the user.

    • If any of the matches get abandoned, those matches won’t be considered for the Promotion.
    • The Cash Bonus will be sent to the qualifying users by 23:59:59 on November 20th.

    • Each qualifying user will be credited Rs.1000 in their respective cash bonus account if they play between 15 - 19 matches during the Promotion Period.

  173. #AUSvINDQuiz: Promotion

    This "#AUSvINDQuiz" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 3 multiple choice questions based on previous AUS v IND matches posted by the Dream11 official page between 18:00:00 IST to 21:59:59 IST on November 24th, 2020. The Cash bonus prize pool for this promotion is 5,00,000. If the winners are more than 20,000, only the first 20,000 will win INR 25 Cash Bonus each. If the winners are less than 20,000, all winners will split the pool money of 5,00,000 equally, given that they have answered all the 3 questions posted. If there are exactly 20,000 winners, all will receive the Cash Bonus reward of INR 25 each.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 18:00:00 hours on November 24th, 2020 till IST 21:59:59 hours on November 24th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 20,000 users who select the correct answers to all three (3) multiple choice questions will be eligible to win cash bonuses worth INR 25.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Cash bonus will be credited by 23:59:59 IST on November 26th, 2020.
    • Cash bonus must be utilised within 14 days from the date of credit

  174. Refer Friends Terms and Conditions of the Promotion

    This Refer Friends offer is open to all existing users of Dream11 who receive communication from Dream11 via feed banner in the Dream11 mobile application only. Under this Promotion, users who receive the communication and invite (“Inviter”) their friends (“Invitee”) to join the Dream11 platform and Invitee register on Dream11 and joins a public paid contest during the Promotion Period ( defined below), the Inviter shall be eligible to receive a Discount Coupon (“Inviter Discount Coupon”) as per the table mentioned below. The Inviter Discount Coupon will be awarded to the Inviter within 48 hours of qualifying for the offer and in accordance with and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who invite their friends to join Dream11 during the Promotion Period and join a paid contest during the Promotion Period.
    • The Invitee must register and join public paid contest only.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 00:00:00 hours on November 28th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on December 6th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • The Inviter shall be eligible to receive the Discount Coupons for the first three invitees who register and join a paid contest during the promotion period only as per the below table.
      On 1st (referral + join paid contest) Discount Pass 50% discount Total discount worth Rs.50
      On 2nd (referral + join paid contest) Discount Pass 50% discount Total discount worth Rs.100
      On 3rd (referral + join paid contest) Discount Pass 50% discount Total discount worth Rs.150
    • The Inviter shall receive their Inviter Discount Coupon within Forty Eight (48) hours from the time of first paid contest joined. The 50% discount can be applied on any public paid contests and the maximum discount value that can be availed by the users is Rs.300.
    • Discount Coupon expires on 31st December 2020.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to cancel this promotion at any time in its sole discretion without any notice.

  175. Invitation Premier League Challenge Terms and Conditions

    This Invitation Premier League challenge is open to all existing users of Dream11 who receive communication from Dream11 via feed banner in the Dream11 mobile application only. Under this challenge, users who receive the communication and invite (“Inviter”) their friends (“Invitee”) to join the Dream11 platform and Invitee register on Dream11 and join a paid public contest during the Challenge Week ( defined below), the Inviter shall be eligible to receive Discount Coupon (“Inviter Discount Coupon”) as per the table mentioned below. Inviter shall receive one (1) point for each paid public contest joined by their invitee during the challenge week. The Inviter Discount Coupon will be awarded to the Inviter within 48 hours of qualifying for the offer and in accordance with and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Challenge is only available to registered users of Dream11 who invite their friends to join Dream11 during the Challenge Week and join a paid public contest during the Challenge Week.
    • The Invitee must register and join paid public contest only.
    • By participating in this Challenge, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 00:00:00 hours on November 28th, 2020 till IST 23:59:59 hours on December 6th, 2020 ("Challenge Week")
    • The Inviter shall get the scores at the end of the match in which the invitee joins and not at the time of contest join.
    • Scores for the Leader Board shall not be awarded to the Inviter if a particular match is cancelled or abandoned.
    • Top 1000 winners on the leader board shall be awarded Discount Coupon depending on the rank secured by the Inviter.
      Qualifying Rank Discount Coupon Amount
      1 - 5 1000
      6 - 10 500
      11 - 100 400
      101 - 1000 300
    • The Inviter shall receive the Inviter Discount Coupon within Forty-Eight (48) hours of completion of the Challenge Week.
    • The 50% discount can be applied on any public paid contests on Dream11. Discount Coupon expires on 31st December 2020.
    • Scores for contest join will be awarded to the Inviter only.
    • If there are more than 1 users on the same rank, the Discount Pass Amount will be divided equally among the same rank holders.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to cancel this promotion at any time in its sole discretion without any notice.

  176. #AUSvINDQuiz: Promotion

    This "#AUSvINDQuiz" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 3 multiple choice questions based on previous AUS v IND matches posted by the Dream11 official page between 11:00:00 IST to 17:59:59 IST on November 29th, 2020. The Cash bonus prize pool for this promotion is 5,00,000. If the winners are more than 20,000, only the first 20,000 will win INR 25 Cash Bonus each. If the winners are less than 20,000, all winners will split the pool money of 5,00,000 equally, given that they have answered all the 3 questions posted. If there are exactly 20,000 winners, all will receive the Cash Bonus reward of INR 25 each.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 11:00:00 hours on November 29th, 2020 till IST 17:59:59 hours on November 29th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 20,000 users who select the correct answers to all three (3) multiple choice questions will be eligible to win cash bonuses worth INR 25.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • Cash bonus will be credited by 23:59:59 IST on December 1st, 2020.
    • Cash bonus must be utilised within 14 days from the date of credit.

  177. KFC BBL Deposit Bonus Offer Terms and Conditions

    This "KFC BBL Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in-app communication. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 11:00:00 hours on Dec 10th, 2020 till IST 13:00:00 hours on Dec 10th, 2020 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      5,555 2,222
      1,111 444
      555 222
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on Dec 11th,2020.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 2,888. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit once.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  183. Dream11 (Cash Bonus Offer)

    This Super Streak Challenge is open to select users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, users who participate in at least 7 or 14 public cash contests on consecutive days during the Promotion Period shall be eligible to receive a total Cash Bonus of ₹100, in accordance with, and subject to the users' full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the promotion:

    • Participation is only available to registered users of Dream11 who receive the banner communication on the Dream11 mobile application and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play contests as per Dream11's terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of Dream11 (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from IST 12:00:00 hours on March 5th, 2021 till IST 23:59:59 hours on April 9th, 2021. ("Promotion Period: 35 days").
    • Participants can only start or restart the challenge in the first 14 days of first receiving the promotion related communication on the banner. The challenge expiry date will be communicated to the user on the Super Streaks Challenge page (Accessible here)
    • The Cash Bonus will be credited to the qualifying users’ Cash Bonus Account within a maximum of 48 hours from the date of eligibility.
    • Participants will have to join public pay-to-play or cash contests for 7 consecutive days to win ₹30 Cash Bonus and for 14 consecutive days to win ₹70 Cash Bonus.
    • Each participant is eligible for both Cash Bonus rewards, but only on the 1st occurrence of eligibility for each reward. For example, if a participant plays for 7 consecutive days on more than one occasion during the promotion period, they will be eligible for the ₹30 Cash Bonus reward only on the first occasion.
    • Only consecutive days will be counted towards a streak.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus that can be availed by the user pursuant to this Promotion is ₹100.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user or the Dream11 platform.
    • The Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date it's credited to the user.

    • Participants will have to join public pay-to-play or cash contests for 7 consecutive days to win ₹50 Cash Bonus and for 14 consecutive days to win ₹100 Cash Bonus.

  187. The IND-ENG T20I Challenge Quiz: Promotion

    This "IND-ENG T20I Challenge Quiz" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 5 multiple choice questions based on India vs England T20I matches, posted by the Dream11 official page between 15:00:00 IST to 21:59:59 IST on March 12, 2021.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 15:00:00 hours on March 12, 2021 till IST 21:59:59 hours on March 12, 2021 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 10,000 users who select the correct answers to all five (5) multiple choice questions will be eligible to win a 50% discount coupon up to INR 25 each (“Discount Coupon”). In the case where there are more than 10,000 winners, then only the first 10,000 users to correctly answer all 5 quiz questions will receive the Discount Coupon.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • The Discount Coupon will be credited by 23:59:59 IST on March 14th, 2021.
    • The Discount Coupon will be available for contests across all sports, and will expire 7 days from when it is credited to the user’s Dream11 Account.
    • The Discount Coupon cannot be clubbed alongside any other rewards or offers available on the Platform.

  188. March Flash Deposit Bonus Offer Dep10get10

    This "March Flash Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in-app communication. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Unutilised Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 18:40:00 hours on 12th March, 2021 till IST 19:00:00 hours on 12th March, 2021 (“Promotion Period”).
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Unutilised Account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below: Promotion Period
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      10 10
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Unutilised Account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • The maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period is set to a total of 20 Qualifying Deposits.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account under this Promotion is INR 200. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit 20 qualifying deposits during the Promotion Period.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59 hours on 13th March,2021.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 3,00,000 (One Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For these Terms, the first 3,00,000 (One Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

  189. The IND-ENG T20I Challenge Quiz: Promotion

    This "IND-ENG T20I Challenge Quiz" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this promotion, there will be 5 multiple choice questions based on India vs England T20I matches, posted by the Dream11 official page between 15:00:00 IST to 21:59:59 IST on March 14, 2021.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 15:00:00 hours on March 14, 2021 till IST 21:59:59 hours on March 14, 2021 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 10,000 users who select the correct answers to all five (5) multiple choice questions will be eligible to win a 50% discount coupon up to INR 25 each (“Discount Coupon”). In the case where there are more than 10,000 winners, then only the first 10,000 users to correctly answer all 5 quiz questions will receive the Discount Coupon.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • The Discount Coupon will be credited by 23:59:59 IST on March 16th, 2021.
    • The Discount Coupon will be available for contests across all sports, and will expire 7 days from when it is credited to the user’s Dream11 Account.
    • The Discount Coupon cannot be clubbed alongside any other rewards or offers available on the Platform.

  199. Dream11 March Deposit Bonus Offer Terms and Conditions

    This "Dream11 March Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in-app communication. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 10:00:00 hours on March 28th, 2021 till IST 13:00:00 hours on March 28th , 2021 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly the amount specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      555 222
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for your First Qualifying Deposit amount of the above listed value.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on March 29th, 2021.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 222.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
