After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 20,000 users who select the correct answers to all five (5) multiple choice questions will be eligible to win a 50% discount coupon up to INR 25 each (“Discount Coupon”). In the case where there are more than 20,000 winners, then only the first 20,000 users to correctly answer all 5 quiz questions will receive the Discount Coupon.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • The Discount Coupon will be credited by 23:59:59 IST on March 30th, 2021.
    • The Discount Coupon will be available for contests across all sports, and will expire 7 days from when it is credited to the user’s Dream11 Account.
    • The Discount Coupon cannot be clubbed alongside any other rewards or offers available on the Platform.

  201. VIVO IPL Pass Terms and Conditions

    This promotion offer of VIVO IPL Pass (VIVO IPL Pass Promotion) is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in-app communication. Under this VIVO IPL Pass Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a VIVO IPL Pass, the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the VIVO IPL Pass Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the VIVO IPL Pass Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this VIVO IPL Pass Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The VIVO IPL Pass Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 14:00:00 hours on 8th April, 2021 till IST 22:00:00 hours on 9th April, 2021 (“Promotion Period”).
    • To participate in the VIVO IPL Pass Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the VIVO IPL Pass corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      VIVO IPL Pass Qualifying Deposit (INR) Conditions
      Rs.999, 10% discount 999 10% discount worth Rs. 999 on all Rs. 50+ public contests in 60 matches of VIVO IPL 2021. Max discount of Rs 100 per match
      Rs.949, 20% discount on Head2Head 949 20% discount worth Rs. 949 on all Rs. 50+ Head to Head public contests in 60 matches of VIVO IPL 2021
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the VIVO IPL Pass and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the VIVO IPL Pass shall be shared only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Users who receive a VIVO IPL Pass must use the VIVO IPL Pass in accordance with the corresponding Conditions mentioned in the above table.
    • VIVO IPL Pass cannot be used for any private contests running on the platform.
    • VIVO IPL Pass shall expire on May 30th i.e. on the VIVO IPL 2021 Final match Day.
    • The VIVO IPL Pass shall be shared with the eligible users by 19:00:00 on 10th April, 2021.
    • The Discount Coupon cannot be clubbed alongside any other rewards or offers available on the Platform.
    • This VIVO IPL Pass Promotion is valid for only the first Five Lakh avails who make the Qualifying Deposit during the Promotion Period.

  202. Dream11 Deposit Bonus Offer Terms and Conditions

    This "Dream11 Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in-app communication. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 10:00:00 hours on April 9th, 2021 till IST 17:00:00 hours on April 9th , 2021 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly any of the amounts specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      7,777 3,333
      5,555 2,222
      777 333
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for each of your First Qualifying Deposit amount of any of the above listed values.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on April 10th, 2021.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 5,888. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit each qualifying deposit once.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  203. VIVO IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge: Week 1 (9th April – 11th April) – DreamSetGo Virtual Event with Krunal Pandya

    • This VIVO IPL Weekly Leaderboard Challenge ("Challenge"), is open to all users of Dream11 who participate in any of the paid VIVO IPL contests.
    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid VIVO IPL Contest during the specified week as above, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contests with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated within 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contests during the week and up till the match on 11th April, 2021 shall be declared a Winner.
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on April 12th, 2021.
    • Winners will receive an event invitation to participate in a virtual event with Krunal Pandya, details of which shall be sent to their Dream11 registered email address on IST 23:59:59 hours on April 12th, 2021.
    • Winners with the qualifying rank will receive a zoom link with access privileges as per the below table.
    • The event will be held at a fixed date and time as communicated in the email sent to winners.
    • In the event winners do not receive an email with a link they can reach out to the helpdesk
    • The email received cannot be shared with any third party. Joining the event will be allowed only through log in with the registered email id of the user. Only single entry per email will be allowed
    • The event may be rescheduled or canceled at Dream11’s discretion.
      Qualifying Rank Event Access
      1-20 Ask Questions
      21-3,000 Attend Session
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on April 12th, 2021 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive an event invitation and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and each user on the same rank shall receive an invitation.
    • Users eligible to ask questions must follow the Dos and Don'ts communicated in the invitation email.

  204. Guess It Quiz: Promotion

    This "Guess It Quiz" ("Promotion"), is open to all users of Dream11 who view the posts by the Dream11 official page on the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, there will be 5 multiple choice questions based on IPL matches from previous seasons, posted by the Dream11 official page between 15:00:00 IST to 22:59:59 IST on April 9, 2021.

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is available to all registered users of Dream11 and can be accessed through visiting the posts shared by the Dream11 Official Page on the Dream11 mobile application.
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 15:00:00 hours on April 9, 2021 till IST 22:59:59 hours on April 9, 2021 ("Promotion Period").
    • Please note that each question posted has a predetermined end time and participation in the contest will only be allowed until that specified end time (“Duration”), which will be clearly visible on the post. After Duration being expired for each question, users will no longer be allowed to participate and submit their response.
    • Only the first 20,000 users who select the correct answers to all five (5) multiple choice questions will be eligible to win a 50% discount coupon up to INR 25 each (“Discount Coupon”). In the case where there are more than 20,000 winners, then only the first 20,000 users to correctly answer all 5 quiz questions will receive the Discount Coupon.
    • Dream11’s decision in selecting, declaring the winner of the Promotion, shall be final and binding on all the users participating in the Promotion.
    • The Discount Coupon will be credited by 23:59:59 IST on April 11th, 2021.
    • The Discount Coupon will be available for contests across all sports, and will expire 7 days from when it is credited to the user’s Dream11 Account.
    • The Discount Coupon cannot be clubbed alongside any other rewards or offers available on the Platform.

      Qualifying Rank Event Access
      1-20 Ask Questions
      21-4,000 Attend Session

  206. Dream Streaks Challenge.

    This Dream Streaks Challenge is open to select users of Dream11 who see the Dream Streaks floating action button on the homepage of the Dream11 mobile application. Under this Promotion, users who participate public cash contests for 5, 12, 20 or 30 consecutive days during the Promotion Period shall be eligible to receive a total Cash Bonus of upto ₹520, in accordance with, and subject to the users' full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the promotion:

    • Participation is only available to registered users of Dream11 who receive the Dream Streaks floating action button on the homepage of the Dream11 mobile application and are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play contests as per Dream11's terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of Dream11 (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from IST 12:00:00 hours on April 12th, 2021 till IST 23:59:59 hours on May 30th, 2021 (“ Promotion Period”).
    • Participants can only start or restart the challenge as long as they see the Dream Streaks floating action button.
    • Users who play consecutively for 5, 12, 20 or 30 days ( each a separate “Milestone”) will have to claim a reward on the app within 7 days from the date of completing a Milestone. Any unclaimed reward shall expire on completion of 7 days.
    • The Cash Bonus will be credited to the qualifying users’ Cash Bonus Account within a maximum of 6 hours from the time of claim of reward.
    • All Milestone rewards can only be unlocked once within a 30-day streak, no matter the number of attempts.
    • Users can make any number of attempts to complete a Streak during this Promotion Period.
    • Rewards are only reset & can be unlocked again after the user successfully completes playing for 30 consecutive days within the Promotion Period. For example, if a participant plays for 5 consecutive days on more than one occasion during the promotion period, they will be eligible for the ₹30 Cash Bonus reward only on the first occasion. Once they complete 30 days, each reward will be locked again and users will be eligible to unlock again.
    • Participants will have to join public pay-to-play contests to complete a Milestone and receive a Cash Bonus reward as communicated to the user on the Dream Streaks Page.
    • Streaks can be won by only joining paid public contests. Any private contest join shall not be counted for the purposes of Streaks.
    • Only consecutive days will be counted towards a streak
    • Action of joining must be performed on that calendar day to maintain streak (doesn't matter when the match deadline is).
    • If a match is abandoned / contest is refunded - we will still count the action as streak maintained.
    • The maximum Cash Bonus that can be claimed by the user pursuant to this Promotion is ₹520
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user or the Dream11 platform.
    • The Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date it's credited to the user.
    • Dream11 reserves the right to cancel this Promotion at any time at its sole discretion. All unclaimed Cash Bonus will be credited to the users Cash Bonus Account.

    This "April Flash Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in-app communication. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Unutilised Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions and users that are able to view the banner and / or get a notification informing them about the offer (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 16:30:00 hours on 11th April, 2021 till IST 17:30:00 hours on 11th April, 2021 (“Promotion Period”).

      Minimum Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount
      10 10%
    • Please note that the user needs to use UPI, PhonePe and Google Pay only as payment options while making a deposit to be eligible for the qualifying cashback.
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Unutilised Account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • The maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period is set to a total of 3 Qualifying Deposits.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account under this Promotion is INR 300. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit 3 qualifying deposits during the Promotion Period.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59 hours on 12th April, 2021.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For these Terms, the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

    • In this challenge, users who participate in a minimum of one paid VIVO IPL Contest during the above specified week, shall be considered as a participant for this Challenge.
    • Users may join any of the paid contests with a maximum of 11 teams per paid contest.
    • It is clarified that for the purpose of this Challenge, the teams used to join the paid contest only shall be considered at the end of the week to determine the winners and not teams created.
    • The highest scoring team of the user at the end of the match shall be considered for this Challenge.
    • Leaderboard shall be updated within 24 hours after that specific match is completed.
    • The user with the highest aggregate score of all teams used to join paid contests during the week and up till the match on 25th April, 2021 shall be declared a Winner
    • The Leaderboard winner will be declared by IST 23:59:59 hours on April 26th, 2021
    • Winners will receive an event invitation to RSVP to participate in a virtual event with Hardik Pandya, details of which shall be sent to their Dream11 registered email address on IST 23:59:59 hours on April 26th, 2021.
    • Only users who RSVP by email by 23:59:59 hours on April 27th 2021, as attending through the form sent to them via email, will receive a zoom link with access privileges as per the below table
    • The event will be held at a fixed date and time as communicated in the email sent to winners.
    • In the event winners do not receive an email with the form they can reach out to the helpdesk
    • The email received cannot be shared with any third party. Joining the event will be allowed only through log in with the registered email id of the user. Only single entry per email will be allowed
    • The event may be rescheduled or canceled at Dream11’s discretion.
      Qualifying Rank Event Access
      1-20 Ask Questions
      21-4,000 Attend Session
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Rank held by the user at IST 23:59:59 hours on April 26th, 2021 shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive an event invitation and not any rank held by the user during the Challenge.
    • In the event two or more users have the same team points at the end of the Challenge, they all will have the same rank and each user on the same rank shall receive an email to RSVP.
    • Users eligible to ask questions must follow the Dos and Don'ts communicated in the email.

  213. Dream11 April Happy Hour Deposit Bonus Offer Terms and Conditions

    This "Dream11 April Happy Hour Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in-app communication. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 17:00:00 hours on April 19th, 2021 till IST 18:00:00 hours on April 19th , 2021 ("Promotion Period").
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of exactly the amount specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Dream11 account during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      75 25
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for your First Qualifying Deposit amount of the above listed value.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on April 20th, 2021.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account pursuant to this Promotion is INR 25.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 5,00,000 (Five Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 5,00,000 (Five Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.

  214. April Flash Deposit Bonus Offer Deposit 99 get 25 CB

    This "April Flash Deposit Bonus Offer" ("Promotion"), is open to all existing users of Dream11 app who see the banner via in-app communication. Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Unutilised Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions and users that are able to view the banner and / or get a notification informing them about the offer (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 17:30:00 hours on 20th April, 2021 till IST 19:30:00 hours on 20th April, 2021 (“Promotion Period”).
    • To participate in the Promotion, you must make at least one cash deposit of a minimum amount as specified in the table below ("Qualifying Deposit") into your Unutilised Account using only debit or credit card on Dream11 only as a payment option during the Promotion Period to be eligible to receive the Bonus Amount corresponding to the Qualifying Deposit made by you, in accordance with the table below:
      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      99 25
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposits made by a user during the Promotion Period, using only debit or credit card shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • The maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period is set to a total of 3 Qualifying Deposits.
    • The maximum Bonus Amount that can be credited to your Cash Bonus Account under this Promotion is INR 75. This is the sum total of cash bonus which will be credited if a user were to deposit 3 qualifying deposits during the Promotion Period.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59 hours on 21st April, 2021.
    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 5,00,000 (Five Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For these Terms, the first 5,00,000 (Five Lakh) avails shall be calculated on first come first serve basis.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.

Under this Promotion, users who make at least one Qualifying Deposit (as defined below) during the Promotion Period (defined below) will be eligible to receive a cash bonus amount ("Bonus Amount"), the value of which will be dependent on the value of the Qualifying Deposit credited into their Dream11 Deposit Account, in accordance with, and subject to the users’ full compliance with these Terms (defined below).

    Please note our terms and conditions ("Terms") in this respect, as they govern your participation in the Promotion:

    • Eligibility – Participation in the Promotion is only available to registered users of Dream11 who are eligible to participate in the pay-to-play Dream11 contests as per Dream11’s terms and conditions (accessible here)
    • By participating in this Promotion, you agree to comply with these Terms, the Standard Terms and Conditions for Promotions and the terms and conditions of the Dream11 game (accessible here)
    • The Promotion will be open for participation from Indian Standard Time ("IST") 12:00:00 hours on April 24th, 2021 till IST 18:00:00 hours on April 24th , 2021 ("Promotion Period").

      Qualifying Deposit (INR) Bonus Amount (INR)
      599 299
    • Please note that only the Qualifying Deposit made by a user during the Promotion Period shall be considered for the purpose of determining whether a user is eligible to receive the Bonus Amount and not any deposits that are made by the user into such user’s Dream11 account before or after the Promotion Period.
    • There is no maximum limit on the number of Qualifying Deposits that can be made by a user during the Promotion Period. However, the Bonus Amount shall be credited only once for your First Qualifying Deposit amount of the above listed value.
    • Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Bonus Amount will be credited into your Cash Bonus Account by IST 23:59:59 hours on April 25th, 2021.

    • Please note that this Promotion is only available to the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails who make the Qualifying Deposit within the Promotion Period. For the purposes of these Terms the first 1,00,000 (One Lakh) avails shall be calculated per Qualifying Deposit offer.
    • Unutilized Cash Bonus will expire in 14 days from the date that it has been credited.
    • The Cash Bonus cannot be clubbed with any other coupon or offers available with the user and/ or the Dream11 platform.
